T02TD1499E:226b-1: aa bhi she ka pra ka ra na /
T02TD1499E:226b-3: dbang gi rab tu byed pa /
T02TD1499E:226b-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1499E:226b-5: sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga ni /
T02TD1499E:226b-6: lha yi 'khor lo bsgom par bya //
T02TD1499E:226b-7: skyo na de yi gsang sngags bzla //
T02TD1499E:226b-9: yang na rang gi lha yi 'bum //
T02TD1499E:226b-10: dkyil 'khor pa yi khri yin no //
T02TD1499E:226b-12: de nas dgun zla ra ba dang /
T02TD1499E:226b-16: ston zla ra ba'i tshes gcig dang /
T02TD1499E:226b-41: sbyor ba byed ba bzang bo brtags nas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i don du slob mas lan gsum du gsol pa gdab po //
T02TD1499E:227a-0: de'i tshe slob ma'i lte bar nyi ma la h'um gi 'od zer gyi snying @227a * //
T02TD1499E:227a-1: ga'i kam nag po las byung ba'i sdig pa sha za lta bu rlig pa 'phyang ba skra gyen du brdzes pa /
T02TD1499E:227a-2: sna rtse nas bton la h'um de yang snying gar 'ongs te /
T02TD1499E:227a-3: h'um mdzad du gyur nas phyir bton la /
T02TD1499E:227a-4: aom sumbha ni su mbha h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1499E:227a-5: aom grihna grihna h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1499E:227a-6: aom grihna pa ya grihna pa ya h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1499E:227a-7: aom a'a na ya ho:bha ga b'a na bidy'a r'a dza ya aa mu ka sya p'a pam n'a sa ya n'a sa ya h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1499E:227a-8: phyag gi rdo rjes sdig pa bton nas brlag par bsam mo //
T02TD1499E:227a-9: slob ma'i sems kyi bgegs ni /
T02TD1499E:227a-10: aom badzra k'i li k'i l'a ya aa mu ka sya sarba bighn'am bandha h'um phat /
T02TD1499E:227a-11: ces brjod cing phur bu gdab bo //
T02TD1499E:227a-12: phur bu'i 'od zer gyis sdig pa rnams bsreg go //
T02TD1499E:227a-13: de nas slob ma sam las kun du bzang por bsams la snying gar zla ba la sna tshogs rdo rje bsam /
T02TD1499E:227a-14: mgo la zla ba la gnas pa'i h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams pa'i rdo rje'i lte ba'i dbus su lha mo m'a ma k'i bzhugs par bsams la /
T02TD1499E:227a-15: de'i thugs ka'i zla ba'i steng gi rdo rje'i lte ba'i nang gi sngags kyi phreng ba las byung ba'i rdo rje phra mos lus khyab par bya ste /
T02TD1499E:227a-16: aom a'a:sham ka re sh'antim ka re ghu ta ghu ta ghu ti ni /
T02TD1499E:227a-17: gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya /
T02TD1499E:227a-18: ghu ti ni ghu ti ni aa mu ka raksha sv'a h'a /
T02TD1499E:227a-21: slob ma bzung ba'i cho ga'o//
T02TD1499E:227a-22: de nas dkar po'i tshes gcig dang /
T02TD1499E:227a-26: bcu bzhi dang nya nas nya'i bar du snga dro nas brtsams te dkyil 'khor gyi las bya'o //
T02TD1499E:227a-27: grong dang skyed mos tshal dang lha khang dang khyim rnams kyi phyogs mtshams bdun dang mchod rten la nye ba dang klu gnas ba'i chu la nya ba dang shing gcig la nye ba dor la dbang ldan du khung bu mtho gang brus la slar bkang ste lhag na bzang /
T02TD1499E:227a-28: yang chus bkang la gom pa brgyar phyin nas chu dma' bar ma song na bzang /
T02TD1499E:227a-29: chu sgra dang bcas na klu'i gnod pa 'ong /
T02TD1499E:227a-31: mandala byas la dkyil 'khor pa dang zhing skyong la sogs pa la mchod gtor bya ste /
T02TD1499E:227a-32: gang dag 'der gnas lha dang klu //
T02TD1499E:227a-33: gnod sbyin srin po'am gzhan yang rung //
T02TD1499E:227a-34: sa 'di bdag gis bslang bgyid na //
T02TD1499E:227a-35: dkyil 'khor don du stsal du gsol //
T02TD1499E:227a-36: zhes lan gsum gsol ba gdab po //
T02TD1499E:227b-1: rmi lam la sogs par byin pa'am ma bkag par go na nyi ma gzhan gyi snga dro nam mkha'i rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa rnams la yid kyis gnang ba nos la srung ba'i 'khor lo dang bgegs la phur bus gdab pa'am bsgom pa'am /
T02TD1499E:227b-2: drag po'i sbyin sreg gis bgegs bskrad la slob ma la bsrung ba'i don du zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byas la /
T02TD1499E:227b-3: sa de la las thams cad pa bzlas pa'i yungs kar dang chu dang thal bas bsang po //
T02TD1499E:227b-4: de nas sa'i lha mo spyan drang zhing mchod la /
T02TD1499E:227b-5: lan gsum gsol ba gdab bo //
T02TD1499E:227b-6: gyis zhes zer ba dang yid kyis nam mkhar bteg la /
T02TD1499E:227b-7: sa de la klu nyal bas de'i pang pa'i char brko'o //
T02TD1499E:227b-8: de la gza' nyi ma rgyu pa'i ston zla tha chungs la sogs pa'i zla ba gsum pa la rim pa bzhin shar lho nub byang du mgo bo blta zhing lho la sogs par phyogs te nyal lo //
T02TD1499E:227b-10: de nas skyon dang zug rdu bsal bar mi nus pa la lag pa reg cing 'khyil pa bzlas pas dag par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1499E:227b-11: dri'i chu dang bsres la dong dgang ngo //
T02TD1499E:227b-12: ma khengs na gzhan yang ngo //
T02TD1499E:227b-13: sa'i dbus su rin po che lnga dang sman lnga dang 'bru lnga gzhug go //
T02TD1499E:227b-14: de nas h'um dang las thams cad pa bzlas pa'i chus gtor zhing brdungs la khru phyed mtho zhing dbus cung zad mtho la byang shar cung zad dma' bar bya'o //
T02TD1499E:227b-15: khang thog dang rdo stengs la sogs pa ma brkos kyang dag pa yin no //
T02TD1499E:227b-16: yungs kar dad chu dang thal ba la 'khyil pa bzlas pas bsang ngo //
T02TD1499E:227b-17: ba'i rnam lnga dang dri'i chu la de bzlas pas g-yas skor du byugs la aom bhu kham gis stong par bya //
T02TD1499E:227b-18: aom lam h'um gis rdo rjer bsgoms te /
T02TD1499E:227b-19: aom me di n'i badzr'i bha ba bandha h'um zhes lag pas reg cing byin gyis brlab bo //
T02TD1499E:227b-20: de nas nam mkha' na gnas pa'i sa'i lha mo mchod de bstims la h'um lam h'um brjod cing pad kor gyi phyag rgya bya'o //
T02TD1499E:227b-21: yi ge brgya pa brjod do //
T02TD1499E:227b-22: sna tshogs pa stong pa nyid dang ro gcig par brtan par mos la stong par bsgom pa ni bla na med pa'i rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD1499E:227b-24: de nas rdo rje dang dril bu bzung nas sa'i dbus su 'dug ste /
T02TD1499E:227b-25: srung ba'i 'khor los bgegs bsal nas /
T02TD1499E:228a-2: sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la dgongs //
T02TD1499E:228a-3: bdag ming rdo rje che ge mos //
T02TD1499E:228a-5: sangs rgyas la sogs kun byon nas //
T02TD1499E:228a-6: bdag la dngos grub stsal du gsol //
T02TD1499E:228a-7: zhes brjod la nam mkha'i rnam snang la sogs pa slob ma bzhi shar la sogs par gnas pas sam /
T02TD1499E:228a-8: gcig gis kyang de dang der song nas /
T02TD1499E:228a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba //
T02TD1499E:228a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02TD1499E:228a-11: chos kun mchog tu bdag med pa //
T02TD1499E:228a-12: dkyil 'khor dam ba bshad du gsol //
T02TD1499E:228a-13: mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs //
T02TD1499E:228a-14: mtshan min thams cad rnam spangs pa //
T02TD1499E:228a-15: kun du bzang po sku yi mchog / dkyil 'khor dam pa bstan du gsol //
T02TD1499E:228a-16: zhi ba chos kyi mchog las byung //
T02TD1499E:228a-17: ye shes spyod pa rnam spyod byed //
T02TD1499E:228a-18: kun du bzang po gsung gi mchog / dkyil 'khor dam pa bstan du gsol //
T02TD1499E:228a-19: sems can kun gyi sems chen po //
T02TD1499E:228a-20: rang bzhin dag cing dri ma med //
T02TD1499E:228a-21: kun bzang thugs mchog kha los sgyur //
T02TD1499E:228a-22: dkyil 'khor dam pa bstan du gsol //
T02TD1499E:228a-23: zhes so sor rang nyid la gsol ba 'debs su gzhug go //
T02TD1499E:228a-24: dngos su gsol ba 'debs pa med na yid kyis bya'o //
T02TD1499E:228a-25: de nas yid kyis nam mkha' la gdeg go //
T02TD1499E:228a-26: de nas langs la shar du bltas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal te bdud bsal pa'i phyir h'um mdzad du bsgoms la mig gnyis nyi zla ltar byas la mig 'bras gnyis h'um du byas pa'i bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i rdo rje'i lta bas phyogs thams cad kyi 'gro ba la blta zhing nga rgyal bskyed la /
T02TD1499E:228a-27: bdag ni rang nyid rdo rje can //
T02TD1499E:228a-28: phyag na rdo rje'ang rang nyid bdag / bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che //
T02TD1499E:228a-29: stobs can rdo rje can bdag yin //
T02TD1499E:228a-30: rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal po bdag / phyag na rdo rje brtan bdag ste //
T02TD1499E:228a-31: bdag po rdo rje chen po bdag / byin gyis brlab pa mi 'dor ro //
T02TD1499E:228a-33: de nas rkang mthil du rdo rje bsgoms te /
T02TD1499E:228b-0: 'gying ba'i nga ro dang bcas pa byed cing rdo rje gsor dril bu dkrol zhing rdo rje'i stang stabs kyis dbang ldan du song nas de nas brtsams @228b te slob ma dang lhan cig rdo rje rkang stabs byed cing /
T02TD1499E:228b-1: gang bdag gi sa phyogs 'di na gnas pa'i lha dang lha ma yin dang /
T02TD1499E:228b-11: sngags grub pa rgan po dang /
T02TD1499E:228b-12: rgan mo 'khor dang bcas pa khyed rnams dengs shig / sa phyogs 'dir bdag rdo rje slob dpon che ge mos sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i yi shes thob par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD1499E:228b-13: slob ma che ge mo'i don du dkyil 'khor che ge mo 'dri bas khyed rnams kyis rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bka' thos pa tsam gyis myur du dengs shig dang /
T02TD1499E:228b-14: gang dag mi 'gro ba de rnams bdag rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis /
T02TD1499E:228b-15: rdo rje 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba gsal zhing rab tu gsal ba'i ye shes kyis rdo rje chen pos mgo bo tshal ba brgyar 'gas par 'gyur ro zhes brjod cing /
T02TD1499E:228b-16: khro bo dpag tu med pa spros pas bgegs bsal par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:228b-17: dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi yang rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab po //
T02TD1499E:228b-18: de nas rdo rje rtse gcig pa rkang pa'i mthil du bsgoms la /
T02TD1499E:228b-19: sa gzhi la bri zhing gar byed pas bskor bar bya'o //
T02TD1499E:228b-20: de'i rjes la rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang /
T02TD1499E:228b-21: rtse lnga pa dang sna tshogs rdo rjes yang ngo //
T02TD1499E:228b-22: bskor ba gzhan du phyogs pas rjes 'dod cing re res bskor ba lan gsum gsum bya'o //
T02TD1499E:228b-23: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo mchod la sa la lag pa reg cing gtso bo'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad yi ge brgya pa lan bdun bzlas la lha bsgom zhing de nyid du nyal lo ;
T02TD1499E:228b-25: de nas lcags sam seng ldeng ngam /
T02TD1499E:228b-26: rus pa'i phur pa sor brgyad pa sboms su sor phyed dang gsum pa stod rang rang gi gzugs la smad phur par 'dug pa bcu yungs kar dang tsandan dmar pos byugs la skud pa kha dog lnga pas dkris te rab gnas byas la mchod de snod sar par gzhag go //
T02TD1499E:229a-0: de nas skad cig gis stong pa'i rjes la rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang ra ba dang gur gyi nang du h'um mdzad du rang nyid bsgoms pa'i snying ga'i h'um las 'od 'phros pas bgegs thams cad bkug nas dong du bcug la h'um las 'od 'phros pa'i khro bo bcu @229a * //
T02TD1499E:229a-2: de rnams kyi aom badzra k'i li k'i l'a ya sarba bighn'am h'um gis gdab /
T02TD1499E:229a-3: aom badzra mudga ra a'a ko ta ya h'um zhes brdung bar bsgoms la /
T02TD1499E:229a-4: de rang nyid kyis kyang dbang ldan nas g-yas skor du 'od kyi phreng ba'i phyogs mtshams brgyad dang /
T02TD1499E:229a-5: steng 'og gi shar nub tu gdab cing brdung ngo //
T02TD1499E:229a-6: mi nus na sgo skyong gis so //
T02TD1499E:229a-7: yang na phur pa med par ji skad bshad pa'i bsgom pa kho nas gdab pa dang brdung ba byas la lag pa gan rkyal du gnas pas bsgyur zhing /
T02TD1499E:229a-8: aom badzra a'a:h'um zhes brjod cing sa la bsnun te de ltar mos pas bya'o //
T02TD1499E:229a-9: bgegs la phur bus gdab pa'o //
T02TD1499E:229a-10: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug ste /
T02TD1499E:229a-11: dri'i dkyil 'khor byas par sa'i lha mo las dam tshig sems dpa' bsgoms nas /
T02TD1499E:229a-12: lag pa g-yas pa'i mthil du h'um bsams te sor mo rtse gsum lan gsum du bsnun pa dang de'i sgra dang h'um gi 'od zer gyis bskul pa'i sa'i lha mo ye shes sems dpa'i ngo bo dang 'dres par gyur pa dga' ba dang ldan pa'i thugs can ser mo zhi ba na bza' dkar po bsnams pa /
T02TD1499E:229a-13: rgyan cha sna tshogs pa can g-yon pa dang cig shos kyi phyag gis gser gyi bum pa bzang po bsnams shing /
T02TD1499E:229a-14: mi 'jig pa mdzad pa zhal gcig pa mdun du gnas pa la mchod de yang dag par bskor ba dang bcas pas /
T02TD1499E:229a-15: aom tshur spyon sa yi lha mo che //
T02TD1499E:229a-16: 'jig rten thams cad kyi ni yum //
T02TD1499E:229a-17: rin chen kun gyis rnam par spras //
T02TD1499E:229a-18: bzang po'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1499E:229a-19: do shal rkang gdub sgra dang ldan //
T02TD1499E:229a-20: rdo rje sems dpa' rab mchod pa //
T02TD1499E:229a-21: mchod yon 'di ni bzhes nas kyang //
T02TD1499E:229a-22: dkyil 'khor las ni grub par mdzod //
T02TD1499E:229a-23: hi hi hi hi h'um sv'a h'a zhes lan gsum brjod pas spyan drang ba dang nye bar gnas par gsol ba sngon du 'gro ba'i lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:229a-24: des kyang de ltar gyis shig ces brjod nas de nyid du thim par bsam /
T02TD1499E:229a-25: de nas rdo rje bcing ba nang du byas nas des sa la reg cing /
T02TD1499E:229a-26: aom badzr'i bha ba h'um zhes lan gsum brjod nas /
T02TD1499E:229a-27: rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i h'um 'bar ba spros pas dbang chen gyi rdo rjer bsams nas /
T02TD1499E:229b-0: aom badzra @229b dri dha tishta zhes lan gsum brjod pas byin gyis brlab /
T02TD1499E:229b-1: des nis dbang du 'gyur ro zhes pa ni sa'i lha mo lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1499E:229b-2: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi la dri zhim pa'i chu bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa yi ge gsum gyis bsngags pas byug pa dang me tog gi gcal dgram pa dang /
T02TD1499E:229b-3: phyi dro khrus byas shing dri zhim pos bsgos la gos sar pa gyon pa me tog phreng ba can /
T02TD1499E:229b-4: kha dri zhim pos bsgos la do shal dang sor gdub la sogs pa'i rgyan rnams go rims ji lta ba bzhin du aom a'a:h'um sv'a h'a zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD1499E:229b-5: aom badzroshn'i sha h'um phat ces pa dag go rims bzhin du bsngags pa'i ras sam dar dmar po'i cod pan gyis brgyan nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su shar gyi phyogs par 'dug pa'am /
T02TD1499E:229b-6: dkyil 'khor gyi shar nas nub tu phyogs par 'dug kyang rung /
T02TD1499E:229b-7: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas bsgom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol shar la sogs su gnas nas sam byang du phyogs pas dbang ldan gyi mtshams su bum pa lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:229b-8: de la zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i bum pa dag gi nang du ni sor bcu drug go //
T02TD1499E:229b-9: lte ba'i 'og nas kha dang mchu'i bar gyi dpangs su sor nyi shu'o //
T02TD1499E:229b-10: kha'i mtshams nas mchu 'phyang ba'i bar ni sor gnyis so //
T02TD1499E:229b-11: mgrin pa ni sor drug go //
T02TD1499E:229b-12: mchu'i bar gyi kha ni sor brgyad do //
T02TD1499E:229b-13: sor brgyad pa'i cha gnyis ni mgul pa'i sbubs so //
T02TD1499E:229b-14: cha gcig ni mchu gnyis kyi dpangs so //
T02TD1499E:229b-15: dbye ba dang bskrad pa dag la ni lto ba'i rgya la sor bcu gnyis so //
T02TD1499E:229b-16: dpangs su sor nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o ;
T02TD1499E:229b-17: / rked pa ni sor brgyad do //
T02TD1499E:229b-19: 'di'i mchu gnyis ni sor mo re'o //
T02TD1499E:229b-20: dbang dang dgug pa dag gi bum pa ni bzo bos ji ltar byas pa'o //
T02TD1499E:229b-21: rengs pa la ni thung zhing zlum pa la dpangs su sor bcu drug go //
T02TD1499E:229b-22: mgrin pa la ni sor bzhi'o //
T02TD1499E:229b-24: las thams cad pa la ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i las su gsungs pa'i bum pa rnams gzung bar bya'o zhes dus kyi 'khor lo las gsungs la /
T02TD1499E:229b-25: de las gzhan pa'i rgyud rnams las ni /
T02TD1499E:229b-26: rtsa ba nag por ri med //
T02TD1499E:229b-27: mchu 'phyang mgrin ring lto ba che //
T02TD1499E:230a-0: @230a * // bum pa rnams de ltar brjod pa yang sor bcu drug pa la sogs par rig par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:230a-1: 'dir gser la sogs pa'i bum pa rgyud du gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'am yang na ji ltar rnyed pa yang bzung ste /
T02TD1499E:230a-2: zhi ba'am rgyas pa'i don du 'bras btags pa'am mthong lo kor ram tsandan gyi lde gu dkar pos byas la sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte pa'i steng du zla ba dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i lha'i sa bon dang phyag mtshan bri bar byas la bdud rtsi lnga dang dri zhim po'i chu sa bkad la rin po che lnga dang /
T02TD1499E:230a-5: aa mra la sogs pa'i lo mas kha brgyan pa dang /
T02TD1499E:230a-6: ske la me tog gi phreng ba dang bcas pa'i ras kha tshar ma nyams pa gnyis bcings pa rnams bla re'i 'og tu mtshan ma dgod pa'i rim pas so sor bris pa'i mandala gyi steng du dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par mdun du ku sha'i steng du bkod nas h'um lan bdun du bzlas pa'i thig skud dkar po bdun gyis aom badzra shi ka re ru ta ma ta di sham bandha h'um zhes pa'i sngags kyis dkri bar bya'o //
T02TD1499E:230a-7: zhi ba la sogs pa'i las dang mthun pa'i kha dog can lnga rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni rgyud gzhan du'o //
T02TD1499E:230a-8: rin po che lnga ni mu tig dang /
T02TD1499E:230a-13: padma r'a ga ma rnyed na dngul lam zangs sam dung yang rung ngo //
T02TD1499E:230a-14: mu men gyi gnas su nor bu yang rung ngo //
T02TD1499E:230a-15: dbul nas ma 'byor pa ni rnam par rgyal ba dang las thams cad pa'i bum pa rin po che dang ldan par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:230a-16: bum pa gzhan la ni ma yin no /
T02TD1499E:230a-17: de la yang rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa nges par rin po che dang ldan bar rig bar bya'o //
T02TD1499E:230a-18: sman lnga ni bri ha ti dang /
T02TD1499E:230a-22: aa ba r'a dzi ta dkar po rnams so //
T02TD1499E:230a-27: so ba dang gro rnams so //
T02TD1499E:230a-28: kha cig tu 'bras so sran gre'u'o //
T02TD1499E:230a-33: au du mw'a ra ste lnga po rnams las gang yang rung ba'i 'dab mas kha brgyan no //
T02TD1499E:230b-0: n'a ga ge sar med na n+ya @230b gro dha'am /
T02TD1499E:230b-2: ras ni dkar po'am dmar po'am ser po'o //
T02TD1499E:230b-3: kha cig tu ljang gu dang nag po 'ang brjod do //
T02TD1499E:230b-4: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la chos 'byung gi dbus su padma la ji ltar rigs par zla ba 'am nyi mar bdag po'i mtshan ma'am sa bon no //
T02TD1499E:230b-5: bum pa gzhan rnams la ni padma la gnas pa'i zla ba 'am nyi mar ji ltar rigs bar lha rnams kyi ni padma la mtshan ma'am sa bon no //
T02TD1499E:230b-6: 'khor lo lnga la so sor re re ste lnga'o //
T02TD1499E:230b-7: yang na pho brang du gnas pa kho na'i lnga'o //
T02TD1499E:230b-8: yang na 'di rnams kyi lnga dang 'khor lo bzhi bzhi ste dgu'o //
T02TD1499E:230b-9: yang na dbus kyi pho brang dang dam tshig gi 'khor lo la gnas pa rnams khyi ni bcu gsum mo //
T02TD1499E:230b-10: thugs kyi 'khor lo'i phyogs su gnas pa rnams kyi gcig dang mtshams su gnas pa rnams kyi gcig go //
T02TD1499E:230b-11: de ltar gsung ge 'khor lo dang sku'i 'khor lo la yang yin te bcu dgu'o //
T02TD1499E:230b-12: phyogs 'di rnams su lha so sor dgod pa la las thams cad pa'i dum skyes ma ni lhag par dgod do //
T02TD1499E:230b-13: de'i rjes su 'brangs pas dkyil 'khor gzhan rnams la yang ji ltar rigs pas bum pa'i grangs rig par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:230b-14: de la gtso bo yin pa'i phyir rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i steng du dung chos sam padma'i snod du h'um gis bsngags pa'i ji ltar snyed pa'i bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i dri zhim po'i chu ye shes kyi bdud rtsir byas pa'i rdo rje rdul phra rab kyi rang bzhin bum pa bcud dang bcas pa de rnams skad cig gis stong pa nyid du byas la /
T02TD1499E:230b-15: bhr'um gyi yi ge las bum pa rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi gzhal yas khang du bsgoms la /
T02TD1499E:230b-16: aom badzra aa mri to da ka h'um zhes lan bdun brjod la 'bru gsum gyis lan gsum du bsngags te me tog gi phreng bas bcings pa'i rdo rje bzhag nas de nas aom tapte te pte ma h'a tapte sv'a h'a /
T02TD1499E:231a-0: lan bdun bdun brjod pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i chu'i rang bzhin du bkug la bcug ste chur lha'i gdan dang bcas pa skad cig gis bsams la rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mdun du bkug la mchod yon dang zhal bsil byin la yang dag par mchod de dam tshig gi 'khor lo la bcug la chags pa chen pos zhu bar gyur ba'i byang chub @231a * //
T02TD1499E:231a-1: kyi sems kyi ngo bo mngon du byas pa de dang ro gcig tu gyur par bsam /
T02TD1499E:231a-2: mtshan ma la yang dam tshig gi lha dang ye shes kyi lha gcig tu gyur pa bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:231a-3: de nas h'um zhes brjod cing rdo rje dang 'brel pa'i me tog gi phreng ba dang ldan pa g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis bzung la aom badzra au da ka h'um zhes lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad chu la bsngags par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:231a-4: yang na 'khor lo'i bdag po'i snying po bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:231a-5: de nas aom a'a: bighn'am ta krita h'um zhes bdud rtsi 'khyil pas bsngags la me tog dkar po gsum gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:231a-6: bum pa gzhan lha gang dang gang gi yin pa de dang de'i sngags kyis brgya rtsa brgyad dang nyi shu rtsa gcig gam bdun du bzlas shing steng gi rdo rje'i mig gi phreng ba'i mthar bzung nas de ltar me tog gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:231a-7: de nas rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'i bum pa rnams me tog la sogs pas mchod nas bsrung ba'i don du las thams cad pa'i chus de'i lo mas bsangs te /
T02TD1499E:231a-8: 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba rnams rdzogs par gyur pa de srid du bgegs rnams zlog par mdzod cig ces brjod cing gtor ma yang nye bar reg ste /
T02TD1499E:231a-9: mi bskyod pa ni ye shes che //
T02TD1499E:231a-10: rdo rje dbyings ni mkha' chen po //
T02TD1499E:231a-11: rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum ;
T02TD1499E:231a-12: / rdo rje dbyings la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD1499E:231a-13: rnam par snang mdzad dag pa che //
T02TD1499E:231a-14: rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che //
T02TD1499E:231a-15: rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog gi mchog / ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD1499E:231a-16: rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab //
T02TD1499E:231a-17: rdo rje nam mkha' 'dri ma med //
T02TD1499E:231a-18: rang bzhin dag pas gos pa med ;
T02TD1499E:231a-19: / rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD1499E:231a-20: rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal po che //
T02TD1499E:231a-21: mi rtog nam mkha' rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD1499E:231a-22: 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa thob //
T02TD1499E:231a-23: rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD1499E:231a-24: don yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02TD1499E:231a-25: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa //
T02TD1499E:231a-26: rang bzhin dag pas yang dag byung //
T02TD1499E:231a-27: rdo rje sems la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD1499E:231a-28: ces bstod pa sngon du song bas dril bu dkrol zhing dung chos sam padma'i snod du chu nyung du blugs la steng du rdo rje bzhag ste bum pa'i steng du gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:231b-0: bdag nyid dam slob ma rnams la bsang ba'i don du bum pa de rnams las chu @231b nyung zad bcus nas dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa'i shar sgo'i byang gi char manji la gnas pa'i dung chos la sogs par las thams cad pa'i bum pa nyid ku sha'i chun po dang ldan pa de'i don du der gzhag par bya'o zhes pa ni //
T02TD1499E:231b-2: bum pa rnams mngon par bsngags pa dang mchod pa la sogs pa nyi ma so so'i thun gsum ma mthun gcig tu bya'o //
T02TD1499E:231b-3: 'dir dkyil 'khor la nye bar mkho ba'i phyir dang po rdul chen dkar po la sogs pas 'dab ma brgyad bris pa la lte ba la rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa 'am las thams cad pa'i bum pa gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:231b-4: shar gyi 'dab ma la thig skud snod du gzhag go //
T02TD1499E:231b-7: nub dang mtshams kyi 'dab ma rnams su ci rigs pa'i rdul tshon lnga'i snod rnams so //
T02TD1499E:231b-8: bum pa de'i chu la 'khyil pa'i sngags sam /
T02TD1499E:231b-9: aom aa a'a: aam aa: zhes bya ba brjod nas tshon thig la bsang gtor bya'o zhes pa ni bum pa lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1499E:231b-10: de nas dkyil 'khor sa gzhi dri bzang po la sogs pas byugs shing me tog gcal du bkram ste //
T02TD1499E:231b-11: der nub tu phyogs par ji ltar rnyed pa'i bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i dri bzang pos bdag po lnga'i le tshe rnams su mandala gru bzhi pa dang lha gzhan la zlum por bya'o //
T02TD1499E:231b-12: de nas mandala rnams su rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis 'khor lo'i gtso bo la sogs pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te bkod nas zhabs bsil la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod pa dang bstod pa dang bdud rtsi myang ba bya ste /
T02TD1499E:231b-13: pus mo g-yas pa sa la btsugs nas lce rdo rje rtse gcig la h'um bkod de /
T02TD1499E:231b-14: lag pa g-yas pas spos phor thogs la g-yon pas dril bu dkrol zhing /
T02TD1499E:231b-15: che ge zhes bya bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD1499E:231b-16: rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD1499E:231b-17: slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang //
T02TD1499E:231b-18: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
T02TD1499E:231b-19: thugs rje'i bdag nyid mgon khyod kyi //
T02TD1499E:231b-21: bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la //
T02TD1499E:231b-22: de ni gnang bar mdzad par rigs //
T02TD1499E:231b-24: sangs rgyas rnams ni dgongs su gsol //
T02TD1499E:232a-0: @232a * // byang chub sems dpa' 'bras gnas dang //
T02TD1499E:232a-1: gang gzhan gsang sngags lha rnams dang //
T02TD1499E:232a-2: 'jig rten skyong ba'i lha dang klu //
T02TD1499E:232a-3: sems can rdzogs sangs bstan gnas dang //
T02TD1499E:232a-4: rdo rje spyan dang snyan ldan pa //
T02TD1499E:232a-5: gang dag bstan la dga' ba rnams //
T02TD1499E:232a-6: bdag la dgongs par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1499E:232a-7: bdag ming rdo rje che ge mos //
T02TD1499E:232a-9: 'gro ba dag par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD1499E:232a-11: deng bdag slob mar bcas pa la //
T02TD1499E:232a-12: thugs ni brtse bar dgongs nas su //
T02TD1499E:232a-13: dkyil 'khor bcas pa thams cad kyis //
T02TD1499E:232a-14: byin gyis brlab pa mdzad par rigs //
T02TD1499E:232a-15: zhes lan gsum don la brten nas brjod cing gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:232a-16: lha lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1499E:232a-17: de nas rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor rnam dkyil 'khor gzhan yang rung ste sngar brjod pa'i tshul gyis dang po bum pa lhag par gnas pa dang /
T02TD1499E:232a-18: dgod pa dang nye bar spyod pa lnga la sogs pa'i mchod pa byas nas nga rgyal la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral ba'i slob ma legs par brtags pa la dge bsnyen la sogs pa'i bslab pa byin pa la yongs su sbyangs la mchog tu theg pa chen po la mos pa rdo rje sems dpa'i sngom pa 'dzin par nus par gcig gam gnyis sam mang po yang rung ste /
T02TD1499E:232a-19: las kyi rdo rjes dkon mchog gsum so sor dkyil 'khor byas la sngon du song bas dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgo dang nye bar rdo rje slob dpon shar ram byang du kha phyogs par gnas pa'i mdun du mandala byas la pus mo g-yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs pa'am /
T02TD1499E:232a-20: tsog bur bsdad la me tog dang bcas pa'i thal mo sbyar te /
T02TD1499E:232a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsum thob par 'dod pa'i bsam pas dkyil 'khor du 'jug par gsol pa gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:232a-22: 'chi dang skye dang rgas pa yis //
T02TD1499E:232a-23: chu srin la sogs kyis 'jigs pas //
T02TD1499E:232a-24: srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol byed cing //
T02TD1499E:232a-25: ston pa khyod ni dga' chen te //
T02TD1499E:232a-26: byang chub chen po'i tshul ston pa //
T02TD1499E:232a-27: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1499E:232a-28: dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol //
T02TD1499E:232a-29: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD1499E:232a-30: skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol //
T02TD1499E:232a-31: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02TD1499E:232b-0: mgon @232b po bdag ni gzhug tu gsol //
T02TD1499E:232b-2: khyod ni theg chen snod yin pas //
T02TD1499E:232b-3: tshul chen 'di la bu tshur shog / gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga 'di //
T02TD1499E:232b-4: khyod la yang dag bstan par bya //
T02TD1499E:232b-5: dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas ni //
T02TD1499E:232b-6: sku gsung thugs kyi rdor 'dzin gyis //
T02TD1499E:232b-7: rdo rje sngags la rab byung bas //
T02TD1499E:232b-8: ye shes mnyam med thob pas na //
T02TD1499E:232b-9: sngags kyi sbyor ba mnyam med pas //
T02TD1499E:232b-10: gang gis stobs chen bdud kyi sde //
T02TD1499E:232b-11: sh'akya seng ge sogs mchog gis //
T02TD1499E:232b-12: chen po mi rnams bcom nas su //
T02TD1499E:232b-15: de phyir shin tu bu khyod kyis //
T02TD1499E:232b-16: thams cad mkhyen nying thob par mdzod //
T02TD1499E:232b-18: de'i rjes su bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste /
T02TD1499E:232b-19: snying po byang chub la thug gi bar du rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad ston pa /
T02TD1499E:232b-21: skyes bu chen po'i sku dbyer med pa bla na med pa'i sku la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02TD1499E:232b-22: 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog zhi ba theg pa chen po'i chos la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02TD1499E:232b-23: tshogs rnams kyi mchog 'phags pa phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02TD1499E:232b-24: de bzhin du lan gsum du'o zhes skyabs su 'gro ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1499E:232b-25: de'i rjes su sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD1499E:232b-26: bdag che ge mo zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste /
T02TD1499E:232b-27: byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du /
T02TD1499E:232b-28: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02TD1499E:232b-29: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis nges byas pa //
T02TD1499E:232b-30: byang chub sems ni bla na med //
T02TD1499E:232b-31: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02TD1499E:232b-32: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sngom pa la //
T02TD1499E:232b-33: tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang //
T02TD1499E:232b-34: dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang //
T02TD1499E:232b-35: sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum //
T02TD1499E:232b-36: bdag gis brtan por gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD1499E:232b-37: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD1499E:232b-38: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02TD1499E:232b-39: deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD1499E:232b-40: nam du yang ni mi gtong ngo //
T02TD1499E:233a-0: @233a * // rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02TD1499E:233a-1: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya ni //
T02TD1499E:233a-2: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD1499E:233a-3: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD1499E:233a-4: rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02TD1499E:233a-5: dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la //
T02TD1499E:233a-6: nyin re bzhin du dus drug tu //
T02TD1499E:233a-7: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin //
T02TD1499E:233a-8: byang chub chen po las byung pa'i //
T02TD1499E:233a-9: padma'i rigs chen dag pa yi //
T02TD1499E:233a-10: phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum //
T02TD1499E:233a-11: dam chos so sor gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD1499E:233a-12: las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD1499E:233a-13: sdom pa kun dang ldan par ni //
T02TD1499E:233a-14: thams cad du ni gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD1499E:233a-15: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi //
T02TD1499E:233a-16: byang chub sems ni bla na med //
T02TD1499E:233a-17: dam pa bdag gis bskyed pa bgyi nas //
T02TD1499E:233a-18: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD1499E:233a-19: bdag gis sngom pa ma lus gzung //
T02TD1499E:233a-20: ma brgal pa rnams bdag gis bsgral //
T02TD1499E:233a-21: ma grol ba ni dgrol bar bgyi //
T02TD1499E:233a-22: dbugs ma phyung la dbugs dbyung ste //
T02TD1499E:233a-23: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod ;
T02TD1499E:233a-25: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1499E:233a-26: de nas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis bsrungs nas de dag gi snying ga dang /
T02TD1499E:233a-28: mgo bo rnams la h'um a'a:/
T02TD1499E:233a-29: aom nag po dang dmar po dang dkar po bsams nas de rnams brjod cing snying ga dang mgrin pa dang /
T02TD1499E:233a-30: mgo bo rnams la dri chu dang bcas pa'i rdo rje dang ldan pa'i khu tshur g-yas pa reg cing mgo bo la me tog dang mdun du spos dang mar me ni snying ga ste dri yang sbyin no //
T02TD1499E:233a-31: de'i rjes la aa shvadtha la sogs pa'i so shing sor bcu gnyis pa drang zhing srog chags med pa ma gas pa rma med pa dri zhim po'i chus bskus pa rtse mo me tog gis bcings la byang du phyogs te slob ma rnams la sbyin no //
T02TD1499E:233a-32: de rnams kyis kyang gru bzhi khru gang ba'i mandala lci bas byugs par shar ram byang du phyogs te /
T02TD1499E:233a-33: so shing de aom badzra h'a sa h'a zhes brjod nas rtse mo 'chos te steng du blta zhing ma gas pa de ltos pa med par mdun du dor ro //
T02TD1499E:233a-34: de rnams la so shing lhung ba'i rjes su 'brangs te 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:233b-0: shar dang byang dang nub dang lho dang steng dang 'og tu phyogs par ltung na rim pa bzhin du zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang dang mngon spyod dang rig pa 'dzin pa @233b dang sa 'og gi dngos grub rnams so //
T02TD1499E:233b-1: mandala gyi ngos su lhung na dngos grub med do //
T02TD1499E:233b-2: de'i rjes su bam gyi yi ge las skyes pa de nyid bzlas pa'i chus kha bkru ba'i phyir mthor 'thung byin nas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa lan bdun du bzlas pa'i chu 'khyor ba gsum la /
T02TD1499E:233b-3: aom hr'i: bi shuddha: sarba dharm'a p'a pa ni tsa aa /
T02TD1499E:233b-4: mu k'a sya sho dha ya sarba bi kawa na aa pa na ya h'um zhes 'don zhing blud par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:233b-5: de nas de rnams kyi phyi ngos su bkod nas h'um las byung zhing de bzlas pa'am 'khyil pa bzlas pa'i ku sha mang po rtse mo ma bcad pa nyal ba'i stan gyi don du byin no //
T02TD1499E:233b-6: de bzhin du sngags kyi don du yi ge ddh'i: las skyes pa'i ku sha chun po gcig la 'khyil pa bzlas la aom badzra t'i kshna bam /
T02TD1499E:233b-7: zhes pa'i sngags kyis sbyin no //
T02TD1499E:233b-8: de la yi ge h'um las byung ba'i skud pa dmar po slob ma'i lus kyi tshad sum sgril byas la 'khyil pa lan bdun bzlas pa'i mdud pa gsum mam bdun byas pa de rnams kyi dpung pa g-yas pa'am lag pa g-yon par rgyud gzhan du bshad pa'i aom buddha mee tree raksha raksha sarba ntu sv'a h'a zhes 'don zhing rang nyid kyis bcings la yang dag par bsrungs te spro ba bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:233b-9: bskal pa bye ba du ma ru //
T02TD1499E:233b-10: sdig pa gang zhig sngon byas pa //
T02TD1499E:233b-12: mthong bas zad par 'gyur lags na //
T02TD1499E:233b-13: gang dag spyod pa mchog 'di la //
T02TD1499E:233b-14: blo gros shin tu dri med pa //
T02TD1499E:233b-15: de nyid kyis ni ngan 'gro'i rgyun //
T02TD1499E:233b-16: sdug bsngal kun ni rab tu bcad //
T02TD1499E:233b-17: bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis //
T02TD1499E:233b-18: rnyed pa rnam gnyis de ring rnyed //
T02TD1499E:233b-19: gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas pa ;
T02TD1499E:233b-20: ; bdag nyid chen po kun gyis ni //
T02TD1499E:233b-21: bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun //
T02TD1499E:233b-22: yongs su bzung ste skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD1499E:233b-23: de phyir khyod rnams theg chen la //
T02TD1499E:233b-24: legs par rab tu skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD1499E:233b-25: theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i //
T02TD1499E:233b-26: lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan //
T02TD1499E:233b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur //
T02TD1499E:233b-29: zhes nyan du bcug nas de rnams 'khyil ba'i sngags kyis bsrungs nas de la bzlas pa'i don du 'khyil pa'i sngags byin te nang par rmi lam bdag la smros shig ces brjod nas gzhal yas khang gi nang /
T02TD1499E:234a-0: @234a * // dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i mthar yol ba la sogs pas bcad par ram /
T02TD1499E:234a-1: gzhan du seng ge'i nyal stangs kyis nyal du gzhug go //
T02TD1499E:234a-2: rang nyid dkyil 'khor gyi khang par zhugs nas bsrung ba'i don du 'khyil pa'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:234a-3: 'dir sdom pa gang slob dpon du mi byed pa la yang thun mong du sbyin par bya ba ni skyabs su 'gro ba dang sems bskyed pa tsam gyi mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1499E:234a-4: gang yang slob dpon du byed pa la sbyin pa de ni slob dpon gyi sngom pa ste rigs lngas bsdus pa'o //
T02TD1499E:234a-5: de'i phyir slob ma lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga 'di ni sdom pa gnyis sbyin pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin no zhes slob ma lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1499E:234a-6: de ltar slob ma lhag par gnas pa byas nas /
T02TD1499E:234a-7: lhag par gnas par byas pa'i lha ye shes kyi thig gi don du nam mkhar bteg la shar du phyogs par skud pa lnga snod lngar bzhag la dri dang /
T02TD1499E:234a-9: yungs kar gyi phye ma dang ldan pa'i tshon gyis kha bsgyur la rigs lnga'i dam tshig pa bskyed la ye shes kyi thig rigs lnga'i ngo bor bstim /
T02TD1499E:234a-10: de nas aom aa n+ye n+ya aa nu ga ta sarba dharm'a: pa ra spha ra aa nu pra bishta sarba dharm'a: aa tynta aa nu pra bashti sarba dharm'a: aom a'a:h'um zhes brjod cing 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis slob ma dang skud pa lnga lngas re re bya'o //
T02TD1499E:234a-11: de ltar bsgrims pa la yang gcig bya'o //
T02TD1499E:234a-12: ring thung dkyil 'khor gyi nyis 'gyur la sboms su nas tsam mo //
T02TD1499E:234a-13: de nas shar du dri chu dang bdud rtsi lnga dang ba'i rnam lngas bsang zhing dri dang me tog dang rdzas kyis mchod de lag par reg cing 'khyil pas bsrung ngo //
T02TD1499E:234a-14: las thams cad pa bzlas pa'i bdud rtsi'i chu dang yungs kar dang dri'i chus gtor te /
T02TD1499E:234a-15: rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag pa g-yas par rig ste aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram m'a ti kra ma h'um zhes brjod nas yi ge gsum brgya rtsa brgyad brjod de lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:234a-16: yang dkyil 'khor gyi sa la aom sarba sam sho dha ni h'um phat ces pas bum pa thams cad kyi chus bsang gtor byas la dris byugs nas me tog bkram sten ma mkha' la dkyil 'khor dmigs te mchod bstod bya'o //
T02TD1499E:234b-0: de nas slob ma 'khyil pas bsrung @234b ba dang /
T02TD1499E:234b-1: rang gi lte bar thig skud bzung ba dang /
T02TD1499E:234b-2: rdo rje rkang pas dang po g-yas sa la 'dor pas 'gro zhing dzdza dzdza dzdza sa bskul zhing des kyang dzdza dzdza dzdza sa sna drangs la nu nas shar dang lho nas byang du nam mkha' la tshangs thig gnyis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i g-yas pas 'debs shing se gol gyi sgra bya'o //
T02TD1499E:234b-3: thig gi sgras sangs rgyas thams cad bskul nas thig skud la bstim mo //
T02TD1499E:234b-4: thig gdab pa thams cad du aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram m'a ti kra ma h'um h'um /
T02TD1499E:234b-5: aom sarba aa ha zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:234b-6: de ltar sa'i gnyis kyang ngo //
T02TD1499E:234b-8: bden bral nas dbang ldan mtshams su gad ba bo //
T02TD1499E:234b-9: me'i mtshams su gnas te shar gyi rtsa thig 'khor lo'i mtshams su gdab bo //
T02TD1499E:234b-13: thig de'i gcig gi brgyad cha sgo yin no //
T02TD1499E:234b-14: de nas hi hi zhes brjod nas sgo'i rtsa ba'i thig dbyi'o//
T02TD1499E:234b-15: thig thams cad btab nas ye shes kyi thig blos bteg la dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar seng ldeng gi phur bu ste /
T02TD1499E:234b-16: rdo rje gcig pa mgo rtse gcig pa h'um las bskyed par bsams la phur pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyud bzlas la brdung ba'i sngags kyis brdungs te /
T02TD1499E:234b-17: zlum po'i thig btab nas aom a'a: h'um badzra mu: ye shes kyi thig skud gshegs su gsol te sangs rgyas kyi thugs kar gzhug go //
T02TD1499E:234b-19: de nas rdul tshon la rigs lnga'i dam tshig bskyed la ye shes bstims nas aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bzla'o //
T02TD1499E:234b-20: de nas yid kyis sbar ro //
T02TD1499E:234b-21: dri dang me tog gis mchod la snod du gzhag go //
T02TD1499E:234b-22: de nas dkyil 'khor lte ba'i phur pa h'um bzhi pa'i sngags kyis bton la blos lag pa'i rdo rje la bstims te khung bu tshon sna lngas bkang la /
T02TD1499E:234b-23: 'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste //
T02TD1499E:234b-24: sems can khams ni rab sgrol mdzad //
T02TD1499E:234b-25: bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang rgyal te //
T02TD1499E:234b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02TD1499E:234b-27: nyes pa kun las rnam par grol //
T02TD1499E:234b-28: 'khor ba'i gnas su yang dag gnas //
T02TD1499E:235a-0: zhes chos dbyings rnam par dag par mos nas aom badzra ram ga sa ma ya aom aa:h'um zhes brjod cing g-yas pas rdo rje bzung la @235a * //
T02TD1499E:235a-1: g-yon pas dbang ldan nas g-yas skor du tshon dgye'o //
T02TD1499E:235a-2: phyi nas slob ma dang ji ltar bde bas tshon dgye'o //
T02TD1499E:235a-3: h'um dang 'khyil pa bzlas pa'i bdud rtsi lnga dang dri'i chus dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du byugs la de bzlas pa'i chus dkyil 'khor bsangs te rdul tshon lhag ma rnams aom a'a: h'um badzra mu: brjod pas ye shes pa gshegs su gsol te tshon sa gtsang sar gzhag go //
T02TD1499E:235a-5: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhir mdo bzhi bklag go //
T02TD1499E:235a-7: ras stong la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1499E:235a-11: 'phan la sogs pa yi ge h'um dang bdag po'i sngags bzlas pa'i aom badzra spa ra na kham zhes phul nas /
T02TD1499E:235a-12: de nas 'khyil pa'i chus mandala bsangs te yi ge gsum dang 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis bsrungs nas rdo rje dril bu bzung ste shar sgo nas nye bar nub tu phyogs pas gnas nas 'khor lo'i dbang po'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas bris pa'i dkyil 'khor stong pa nyid kyi rjes la srung ba'i 'khor lo dang bgegs la phur bus gdab pa la sogs pa'i cho ga bsgom par bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du brtag par byas nas rab tu sgrub pa'i phyi rol gyi phyag rgya dang snyoms par 'jug par bya ste /
T02TD1499E:235a-13: de med na ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang snyoms par 'jug pas kyang rung ste /
T02TD1499E:235a-14: yang dag par bskyod pa'i dga' ba'i sgras ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs la zhal bsil dang mchod yon phul ba sngon du 'gro bas rang gi nang du bcug la 'dod chags chen pos zhu bar gyur pa de rdo rje'i lam nas byung nas padmar ye shes kyi lha'i 'khor lo'i bdag nyid spros te /
T02TD1499E:235a-15: dam tshig gi 'khor lo gnas ji lta bar zhugs par bsams nas spyan dang sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i de ma thag tu rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang lha mo rnams kyis dbang bskur nas ji ltar rigs pas rgya sa gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:235a-16: de nas mchod pa'i lha mo spros pa rnams kyis yid bzhin gyi mchod pas mchod de bsil ba'i ras dang ras zung dang /
T02TD1499E:235b-0: bla re la ras dpyangs pa dang yi ge gsum gyis bsngags pa'i bza' @235b ba dang bldag pa dang bca' ba dang gzhib pa dang btung ba dang zhal zas la sogs pa dang gser dang bu mo dang glang po che dang rta dang ba lang la sogs pa phul nas phyi rol gyi rnal 'byor ma drug gam brgyad dam bzhis gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i ngo bos rang gi mchod pas mchod nas dril bu dkrol zhing /
T02TD1499E:235b-1: mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che //
T02TD1499E:235b-2: rdo rje dbyings ni mkha' chen po //
T02TD1499E:235b-3: rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum //
T02TD1499E:235b-4: rdo rje dbyings la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD1499E:235b-5: rnam par snang mdzad dag pa che //
T02TD1499E:235b-6: rdo rje zhi ba dga' chen po //
T02TD1499E:235b-7: rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog gi mchog /
T02TD1499E:235b-8: ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD1499E:235b-9: rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab //
T02TD1499E:235b-10: rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med //
T02TD1499E:235b-11: rang bzhin dag pas gos pa med //
T02TD1499E:235b-12: rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD1499E:235b-13: rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal po che //
T02TD1499E:235b-14: mi rtog nam mkha' rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD1499E:235b-15: 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa thob //
T02TD1499E:235b-16: rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD1499E:235b-17: don yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02TD1499E:235b-18: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa'i //
T02TD1499E:235b-19: rang bzhin dag pas yang dag 'byung //
T02TD1499E:235b-20: rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD1499E:235b-22: rang dang shes rab kyi me tog dang bcas pa'i byang chub kyi sems padma'i snod du bcug nas bdud rtsir bcas pa phul te /
T02TD1499E:235b-23: de rnams bdud rtsi myong bas tshim par byas la bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du mos nas 'khor lo'i bdag po'i gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad dkyil 'khor pa'i sngags nyi shu rtsa re re dang yi ge brgya pa bzla'o //
T02TD1499E:235b-24: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i cho gas 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma dbul lo //
T02TD1499E:235b-25: yong na sgrub pa'i grogs dkyil 'khor gyi 'gram du bzhag nas phyir byung ste 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma'i cho gas rang gi 'dod pa'i lha dang dbang po la sogs pa la gtor ma dbul lo //
T02TD1499E:235b-26: de nas lag pa g-yas pa gan rgyal du byas nas gung mo dang ming med cung zad bskum la mngon du phyogs par gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD1499E:235b-27: lag pa gnyis pus mo nang du byas nas tsog tsog por 'dug cing /
T02TD1499E:236a-0: mi smra bar lag pa'i ze'u 'bru'i kha la mang du bya ba cing lan gsum gsum du rna ba'i bug pa gnyis @236a * //
T02TD1499E:236a-2: mig dang kha dang lag pa dang lto ba dang mgo rnams la reg par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:236a-3: de lta bu ni nye reg gi cho ga'o //
T02TD1499E:236a-4: de'i rjes la yod na lhag chad la sogs pa'i nyes pa zhi bar bya ba dang dkyil 'khor tshim par bya ba'i phyir zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg byas nas khams gsum rnam bar rgyal ba'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas me tog gi phreng ba blangs te aom sumbha ni sumbha h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1499E:236a-5: aom grihna gri hna h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1499E:236a-6: aom grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1499E:236a-7: aom a'a na ya ho bha ga b'ana bidy'a r'a dza h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1499E:236a-8: ces bya ba'i sngags zlos shing rdo rje shugs kyis dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas rdo rje gsol zhing dril bu dkrol nas rdo rje rkang pas aom h'um phat ces bya ba dang aom h'um a'a: phat ces bya ba dang /
T02TD1499E:236a-9: aom h'um aa aa phat ces bya ba dang /
T02TD1499E:236a-10: aom h'um ha na ha na m'a ra ya dushd'a na /
T02TD1499E:236a-11: gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya aa aa h'um hri phat ces pa'i sngags bzhi go rims bzhin du zlos pa'i shar sgo la sogs par brjod do //
T02TD1499E:236a-12: slob ma rnams dang bskor ba gsum lhan cig tu byas nas lhag pa dang ma tshang pa'i nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir 'khor lo la bltas te phreng ba bcom ldan 'das la phul nas bskor ba'i grangs bzhin nub la sogs pa bzhir gnas pas shar la sogs pa bzhir aom badzrod bha ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha ya h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi sgo dbye bar sa sams te aom sa ma ya pra be sha ya m'i zhes brjod nas gar byed cing slar phreng ba blangs la rang rang gi mgo la bcings te 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal nas /
T02TD1499E:236a-13: nges sems can thams cad la dngos grub thams cad kyi bka' drin mdzod cing ces go bar byas nas bsgom pa dang bzlas pa bya'o //
T02TD1499E:236a-14: 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa las phyi ngos su dbang po la sogs pa go rims bzhin du dkar po dang /
T02TD1499E:236a-21: ljang gu'i ba dan brgyad dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la phul nas shar la sogs par gzugs par bya zhes pa ni shes rab skyong zer /
T02TD1499E:236a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud du /
T02TD1499E:236a-23: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD1499E:236a-24: ba dan brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan //
T02TD1499E:236b-0: de'i rigs rnam par snang mdzad dang @236b de'i rigs kyi lha rnams kyi ni rang rang phyogs su dgod par bya'o zhes kha cig ste /
T02TD1499E:236b-1: rin chen dbang po dang de'i rigs can rnams ni bden bral du'o //
T02TD1499E:236b-2: snang ba mtha' yas dang de'i rigs las byung ba rnams rlung du'o //
T02TD1499E:236b-3: don yod grub pa dang de'i rigs kyi lha rnams kyi lha rnams ni dbang ldan du'o//
T02TD1499E:236b-5: de'i rigs kyi lha rnams rang gi phyogs su zhes kha cig go //
T02TD1499E:236b-11: dbang por me'i dbang po dang /
T02TD1499E:236b-13: dben bral dud ka rnams ni rang rang gi phyogs su'o //
T02TD1499E:236b-14: nub tu chu lha dkar po dang /
T02TD1499E:236b-16: thags bzangs ris kyi nag po dang /
T02TD1499E:236b-17: rlung dang rlung gi ljang gu'o //
T02TD1499E:236b-18: byang du lus ngan po'i ser po dang /
T02TD1499E:236b-20: dbang ldan du dbang po'i dkar po'o //
T02TD1499E:236b-21: de ltar 'phan bco lnga ni phyogs kyi bdag po rnams mnyes par bya ba'i don du'o //
T02TD1499E:236b-22: mi 'byor na ni nus pa ji lta bar ba dan rnams dbul bar bya'o zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i cho ga 'khor dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1499E:236b-23: de'i rjes la de nas bla mas nang par gtor ma btang nas dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa nas byung ste slob ma rnams la rmi lam dris nas ri las lhung pa la sogs pa mi dge ba'i rmi lam byung na bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis bsrungs nas dkyil 'khor gyi khang par 'jug pa'i tshe slob ma rnams kyi sngon du slob dpon zhugs par bya ste //
T02TD1499E:236b-24: aom bra be sha pha ga b'a na ma h'a su kha moksha pu ram sarba siddhi su kha pra da pa ra ma su kha au dha ma dhi siddhi dza: h'um bam ho: pra siddha sv'a h'a /
T02TD1499E:236b-25: zhes gzengs bstod pas zhugs nas g-yas skor gyis 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi nga rgyal gyis nub la sogs pa'i sgor gnas te dkyil 'khor gyi shar la sogs pa'i sgor aom badzra aud gha ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha ya h'um zhes 'don zhing phye la /
T02TD1499E:236b-26: me tog gi phreng ba la aom pa ra ma su kham sh'a ya su la li te /
T02TD1499E:236b-27: bi la s'i na mi ta na mi te na m'a mi bha ga b'a ntam dza: h'um bam ho: hi hi hi hi h'i: pra t'i tstsha ku su ma aanydza li ni n'a tha ho //
T02TD1499E:237a-0: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis dkyil 'khor la dor nas slar bzung ste phreng ba'i dbang gis bsam pas rang gi mgo la bcings nas mngon sum du @237a * //
T02TD1499E:237a-1: gyur pa'i 'khor lo'i dbang phyug bla mar mos nas des ster bzhin pa'i phreng ba'i dbang la sogs pa 'chad par 'gyur pa'i dbang ma lus pa dang tsho ga bzhin du slob dpon gyi las thams cad la gnang ba thob nas slob ma gzhug pa'i ched du bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin de kho na nyid kyi bstod pa sngon du 'gro bas dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub 'dod par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:237a-2: de kho na nyid kyi bden pa'i byin rlabs kyang bya'o //
T02TD1499E:237a-3: nam mkha' las skyes mtshan ldan phyir //
T02TD1499E:237a-4: thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog / sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin //
T02TD1499E:237a-5: mi bskyod rdo rje deng bdag bsgrubs //
T02TD1499E:237a-6: kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste //
T02TD1499E:237a-7: dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha //
T02TD1499E:237a-8: rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal //
T02TD1499E:237a-9: mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod //
T02TD1499E:237a-10: nyes pa'i mnga' rtag par mkhyen //
T02TD1499E:237a-11: 'dod chags kun gyi rjes chags pa //
T02TD1499E:237a-12: 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che //
T02TD1499E:237a-13: bcom ldan de ni bdag grub mdzod //
T02TD1499E:237a-14: shin tu dag pa chos kyi mchog / gdod nas grol bas de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1499E:237a-15: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02TD1499E:237a-16: byang chub sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod //
T02TD1499E:237a-17: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug che mchog phyag rgya yis //
T02TD1499E:237a-18: grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pas ;
T02TD1499E:237a-19: ; rdo rje snyems par bdag mdzod cig / sems can kun gyi yid khyab cing //
T02TD1499E:237a-20: sems can kun gyi snying la gnas //
T02TD1499E:237a-21: sems can kun gyi yab gyur nyid //
T02TD1499E:237a-22: 'dod chags dam tshig mchog gyur pa'i //
T02TD1499E:237a-23: bden pa gang gi ye shes mchog / shes rab thabs bdag dkyil 'khor yin ;
T02TD1499E:237a-24: ; bden pa de yis mgon po bdag / khyed kyis 'dod pa rab rdzogs mdzod //
T02TD1499E:237a-25: chos rnams gzugs brnyan mtshungs par di / dag cing gsal la rnyog ba med //
T02TD1499E:237a-26: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02TD1499E:237a-27: rgyu dang las las lang dag byung //
T02TD1499E:237a-28: de bzhin nyid las de nyid skyes //
T02TD1499E:237a-29: bden pa de yis slob ma ni //
T02TD1499E:237a-30: gzugs brnyan gsal bar slob ma bzhin //
T02TD1499E:237a-31: kun gyis dri ma med mthong shog / ces brjod pa de ni slob dpon 'jug pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1499E:237b-0: de nas sgo'i slob dpon mi 'dod na gzhan las kyi rdo rjes sta gon du gnas par byas pa'i s'o ba ma bslab pa gnyis dang ldan pa dri zhim @237b po'i chus khrus byas la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis bsngags pa'i gos dmar po 'am gzhan yang rung ste yol ba'i phyir rol du rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs su'am /
T02TD1499E:237b-1: 'khor lo'i bdag p'i gzugs su slob ma dmigs la aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu tta ra bodhi aa lam k'a ra bsta p'i da me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um zhes smad dkris bya'o //
T02TD1499E:237b-2: aom badzra au shn'i sha h'um phat ces pas spyi gtsug tu thod bya'o //
T02TD1499E:237b-3: bdud rtsi 'khyil pas sngags pa'i gos dmar po'am ser pos /
T02TD1499E:237b-4: aom tsakshu bandham ba ra ma n'a ya h'um zhes pa'i sngags kyis mi ga ras bcing ngo //
T02TD1499E:237b-5: aa kham b'i ra h'um zhes brjod pas me tog gi phreng ba byin te g-yas su bzung la las thams cad pa'i bu ma pa'i chus gtor zhing snying ga dang mgrin pa dang spyi bor gnas pa'i rdo rje nga dang padma dang 'khor lo'i steng du nyi ma dang zla ba dang h'um na ga bo a'a: dmar po aom dkar po'i ye'i 'od zer gyis lus gsal bar bya sta h'um zhes brjod cing dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgor bzhad la /
T02TD1499E:237b-6: las kyi rdo rje sa bzung nas dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya ba'i phyir dri bar bya'o //
T02TD1499E:237b-8: des skral bzang bdag bde ba chen po la'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:237b-9: de nas de la aom sarba yo ga tsi tta autp'a da a'a mi zhes 'don du bcug nas byang chub tu sems bskyed par byas la snying gar rdo rje me tog dang bcas pa reg ste aom su ra ta sa ma ya stvam ho: siddhi badzra ya th'a su kham zhes 'don zhing bzung nas /
T02TD1499E:237b-10: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob par 'gyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di khyod kyi dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa rnams la smra bar mi bya zhing dang pa dang mi ldan pa rnams la yang smra bar mi bya'o zhes brjod nas /
T02TD1499E:237b-11: aom a'a: ya m'anta kri ta h'um zhes bya bas khrid nas a'a kham b'i ra h'um zhes bya ba 'dis yo la ba'i nang du bcug nas /
T02TD1499E:237b-12: ma h'a ra ta su dri dha su thoshyo su sukho badzra satva a'a dya siddhi n'am /
T02TD1499E:237b-13: zhes 'don zhing skor ba byed cing thal mo sbyar nas dkyil 'khor gyi shar sger /
T02TD1499E:237b-14: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza au pa sth'a na ya a'atma n'm ni ry'a ta y'a mi sarba th'a ga ta badzra satva aa dhi tishtha sva m'am /
T02TD1499E:237b-15: aom sarba buddha p'u dza au pa stha naya a'atma n'am ni ry'a ta a'a mi /
T02TD1499E:237b-16: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra bee ro tsa na ye aa dhi tshhyi sva m'am zhas so //
T02TD1499E:238a-0: lhor ni aom sarba ta th'a @238a * //
T02TD1499E:238a-1: ga ta p'u dza aa bhi she ka ya a'atma n'am ni r+ya ta y'a mi /
T02TD1499E:238a-2: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra ratna aa bhi shi nytsa m'am /
T02TD1499E:238a-3: nub tu ni aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u rdzo pra brtan na ya a'a tma nlam ni r+y'a ta y'a mi /
T02TD1499E:238a-4: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra dharm'a pa rta ya m'am /
T02TD1499E:238a-5: byang du ni aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza karm'a nam a'atma n'i ni ry'a ta y'a mi sarba ta tha ga ta badzra karma ku ru m'am /
T02TD1499E:238a-6: zhes bya ba'i sngags ldas rim pa bzhin du dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phyag byed du bcug na /
T02TD1499E:238a-7: yang shas sgor aom gu ru car na p'u dza au pa sth'a na ya a'atma n'am ni ry'a ta y'a mi /
T02TD1499E:238a-8: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pa ri tra ma aam tha a'atma n'am ni ry'a ta y'a mi /
T02TD1499E:238a-9: zhes bya ba'i don sngon du 'gro bas 'don du gzhug go //
T02TD1499E:238a-10: de nas deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis deng ngas rdo rje'i ye shes bskyed pa'i ye shes gang 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob na dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
T02TD1499E:238a-11: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du smra bar ma byed cig / dam tshig ma nyams par gyur ta re zhes mgo bro rdo rje bzung nas dril bu dkrol zhing /
T02TD1499E:238a-12: 'di ni dam tshig rdo rje ste //
T02TD1499E:238a-13: gal te khyod kyis gang du yang //
T02TD1499E:238a-14: rung ba'i mdun du smra ma byed //
T02TD1499E:238a-16: zhes brjod nas snying gar rdo rje bzung ste /
T02TD1499E:238a-17: rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02TD1499E:238a-18: snying la yang dag zhugs par gyur //
T02TD1499E:238a-19: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02TD1499E:238a-20: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02TD1499E:238a-21: zhes bka' bsgo nas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i steng na gnas pa'i chu ming med dang mthe bos bzung ba'i snod kyis de'i khar blugs shing /
T02TD1499E:238a-22: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02TD1499E:238a-23: 'das na sreg cing dmyal bar ltung //
T02TD1499E:238a-24: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ster /
T02TD1499E:238a-25: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'thungs shig / ces brjod cing khyor pas chu 'thung du bcug pa /
T02TD1499E:238a-26: der phyin chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis ngas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de yang bya dgos so //
T02TD1499E:238a-27: khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig / brnyas pas khyod yang ba ma spangs bar khyod dus ma yin par shi pa'i dus byas nas dmyal bar gyur ta re zhes gdon par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:238a-28: dam tshig gi chu sbyin pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1499E:238b-0: de nas bsgrub pa'i dus las sngon du @238b dngos grub la sogs pa nges pa'i don du slob ma snod dang ldan pa la lha dbab par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:238b-1: de la dang por ri la sogs pa yid dang rje sa su mthun pa'i gnas su sngon du 'gro ba byas pas sems brtan par rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor shin tu brtan par dmigs pa'o //
T02TD1499E:238b-2: 'bebs pa la nus pa thob pas mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i lhag par gnas pa'i slob ma mdun du bya ste skad cig stong pa nyid kyi rjes la yi ge aa las byung pa'i snang ba mtha' yas gzugs su bskyed la /
T02TD1499E:238b-3: bdag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la rdo rje sems dpa' 'bab par gyur cig ces 'don du bcug nas de'i snying gar lam las bskyed pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor ser po rdo rje sa mtshan pa gru bzhi par nyi ma la h'um sngo po dang mgo bo la bam las byung ba'i chu'i dkyil 'khor dkar zhing zlum pa bu ma pas mtshan par zla ba la yi ge aom dkar po dang mgrin par yam las byung ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor sngon po gzhu lta bu ba dan g-yo ba gnyis kyis mtshan par zla ba la yi ge aa dmar po bsgoms nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis thugs dang gsung dang sku rdo rje rnams kyi rang bzhin h'um a'a: aom gyi yi ge rnams la bcug nas rkang pa gnyis kyi 'og nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis mtshan pa'i ram yongs su gyur pa'i me'i dkyil 'khor dmar po gru gsum pa yi ge ram dmar pos mtshan pa cig 'od zer 'phros pa las gnas pa'i ye ge dzhe dmar pos slob ma 'degs shing yi ge dzhee gyi 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis 'og gi bu ga nas zhugs pa dang h'um la sogs pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis lus ma lus pa kun nas bkang par bsgom zhing spos phor 'degs pa sngon du 'gro bas dril bu dkrol zhing a'a be sha ya stam bha ya ra ra ra ra tsa la ya tsa la ya h'um ha aa dzheem zhes bya ba'i sngags lan brgyar 'don zhing bsam gtan mchog tu gzhol pas dbab par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:238b-4: gal te phebs nas cher 'phags par gyur na de'i steng du ri rab rdo rje'i rang bzhin de'i steng du dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor de'i steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa de'i steng du yi ge dza: de'i steng du rnam par snang mdzad bsgoms te bzlog par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:239a-0: de ltar phebs par gyur pa las slob ma'i thugs rdo rje'i @239a * //
T02TD1499E:239a-1: 'od zer rnams kyis gsung rdo rje'i sa bon gyi bdag nyid bskul bar byas la lces la zla ba la gnas pa'i a'a: dmar po las 'od zer gyi phreng bas 'khrugs pa bsgoms nas rdo rje smros zhing ces smrar gzhug pa byas la de ltar 'dis rang ngam gzhan gyi dge ba'am mi dge ba'i bya ba bden par smra'o //
T02TD1499E:239a-2: de nas zhugs pa'i lha'i snying ga'i 'od zer gyis bkug nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon la bstim zhing slob ma'i mgo la rdo rje bzung nas /
T02TD1499E:239a-3: aom khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02TD1499E:239a-4: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
T02TD1499E:239a-5: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
T02TD1499E:239a-6: slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1499E:239a-7: zhes bya ba sngon du 'gro ba'i h'um a'a badzra mu: zhes bya bas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02TD1499E:239a-9: dril bu'i zhabs kyis bris pa yis //
T02TD1499E:239a-10: bshang gci la sogs byugs pa yi //
T02TD1499E:239a-11: ras ni bud med rdul dang ldan //
T02TD1499E:239a-12: gtubs la byi la'i rtug pas byug / gu gul dang ni rnam par bsreg / yi dgas me ni kun blangs la //
T02TD1499E:239a-13: de ni pada'i snod bzhag nas //
T02TD1499E:239a-14: der ni de kun bcug nas ni //
T02TD1499E:239a-15: g-yas brkyang ba yis kun gnas pa'i //
T02TD1499E:239a-16: 'khor lo gsum bdag khro ba ltas la //
T02TD1499E:239a-17: de yis 'khor lo gsum bdag la //
T02TD1499E:239a-18: rdo rje bdug pa de phul na //
T02TD1499E:239a-19: phebs par 'gyur bar the tshom med //
T02TD1499E:239a-20: aom tishtha ma h'a krodha sa ma ya h'um shr'i he ru k'a ya bidma he bidy'a r'a dza ya dhi ma he sv'a h'a zhes bya ba 'dis dpa' bo rab tu bskur bar bya'o zhes mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud 'bum par gsungs pa'i tshogs dbab par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:239a-21: bshad gci la sogs zhes pa ni bdud rtsi lnga dang sgron ma lngas byugs pa'o //
T02TD1499E:239a-22: bla ma bde mchog gi gzugs g-yas brkyang du gnas pas bde mchog gi bdag nyid slob ma g-yas brkyang du gnas shing snying gar thal mo sbyar la lag pa g-yon gyis dril bu sgrogs shing tishtha zhes bya ba'i sngags dregs pa dang bcas pas zlos pas lag pa g-yas kyis bdug par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:239a-23: de nas gal te phebs zhes bya bar rig pa bya'o //
T02TD1499E:239b-0: gal te yang rgyud kha cig tu bu mo lo bcu gnyis lon pa skyes pas ma nyams pa yan lag dang nying lag ma nyams pa dang khye'u gzhon nu lo de nyid lon pa la bud med kyi yul mi shes @239b pa yan lag dang nyid lag ma tshang ba med pa'i snod mdun du bzhag nas lha dbab par bya'o zhes gsungs te /
T02TD1499E:239b-1: de la yang skad cig so so la rdo rje 'chang gi sku mngon du byed cing tshogs bsags ba cig char brtan par bsgom nus pas yan lag ma tshang ba med pa dang /
T02TD1499E:239b-2: lo mang po'i phyogs la spangs te /
T02TD1499E:239b-3: de la yang 'khyil pas lha phebs par 'gyur ro zhes pa ni /
T02TD1499E:239b-4: rgyud gzhan du mang du gsal bar byas pa slob ma la dbab pa'i don du bsgrub par bya'o zhes pa dbab pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1499E:239b-5: de nas slob ma dkyil 'khor la phyogs pa la phyogs kyi mig lam ni ci snang zhes dris pa na des smras pa ;
T02TD1499E:239b-10: snang ba rnams kyis rim pa bzhin du 'di la zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang dang mngon spyod kyi dngos grub la skal ba dang ldan par rig par byas nas 'di'i mthe bong gnyis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag pa g-yas kyis bzung ste ;
T02TD1499E:239b-11: rdo rje rkang pa'i gar gyi tshul gyis 'khyil pa brjod cing skor ba gsum byed du bcug nas bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'di bya'o //
T02TD1499E:239b-13: slob ma 'di ni yang dag bcug / bsod nams ci 'dra de 'dra yis //
T02TD1499E:239b-14: lha rnams rigs kyi rim par 'gyur//
T02TD1499E:239b-16: rigs gang gi ni snod gyur dang //
T02TD1499E:239b-17: bsod nams mthu ni ci 'dra bar //
T02TD1499E:239b-18: de ltar dkyil 'khor 'di la shog / ces pa ni dkyil 'khor du slob ma spyan 'gegs dang bcas pa gzhug pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1499E:239b-19: de nas sngar bzung ba'i phreng ba la yi ge tram gis bsngags pa las gang zhig ma rnyings shing gsar pa'i me tog cig phyung la de'i lag pa thal mo sbyar ba la sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:239b-20: de'i tshe nges me tog gi phreng ba dang rang nyid kyang yi ge gsum gyis 'od gsal zhing sdig pa bkru bar mos nas bla mas kyang de ltar byin gyis brlabs pas gus pa sngon du 'gro ba dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug mdun du gnas pa bzhin dmigs la dkyil 'khor der yid kyis zhugs te /
T02TD1499E:239b-21: de'i dbus su aom tishtha badzra dri dho mi bha ba /
T02TD1499E:239b-22: sh'a shva to me bha ba hri da yam me /
T02TD1499E:239b-23: aa dhi tishtha sarba siddhem me pra ya tstsha h'um ha ha ha ha ho: a'a khm b'i ra h'um /
T02TD1499E:240a-2: pra t'i tstsha aanydza li n'a tha ho: //
T02TD1499E:240a-3: zhes sngags 'don zhing me tog dor bar bya'o //
T02TD1499E:240a-4: re kh'a lnga'i nang du me tog lhung ba dang bstun te 'di la rigs bstan par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:240a-6: dngos grub kyang mtshon par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:240a-7: gal te sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzod spu 'am ;
T02TD1499E:240a-8: dbu 'am gtsug la me tog lhung na phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub bo //
T02TD1499E:240a-9: sku mchog la ni mchog go //
T02TD1499E:240a-11: 'og gi cha la ni tha ma'o //
T02TD1499E:240a-12: sku las ha cang ring ba ni yun ring pos so //
T02TD1499E:240a-13: nye na dngos grub myur ro //
T02TD1499E:240a-14: lha rnams kyi rang gi gnas ni re'u mig la sogs pa rnam par bcad pa las shes par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:240a-15: gal te lha gnyis kyis bar du lhung na de'i ste me tog gang la nye ba de'i rigs su 'gyur ro //
T02TD1499E:240a-16: mnyam pa nyid na ni gnyis ka'o dngos grub mchog 'grub pa'o //
T02TD1499E:240a-17: de'i tshe gang la dad pa de'i rigs yin no //
T02TD1499E:240a-18: re kh'a lnga'i phyi rol du lhung na lan gsum gyi bar du dor bar bya'o ;
T02TD1499E:240a-19: / de ltar na'ang phyi rol du lhung na dngos grub phra mo'o //
T02TD1499E:240a-20: phyi rol gyi zlum po'i re kh'a rnams dang rdo rje'i phreng ba'i phyi rol la ni dngos grub med do //
T02TD1499E:240a-21: 'di la dkyil 'khor yang mi bstan no //
T02TD1499E:240a-22: sngags bzlas pa la sogs pa skal ba dang ldan pa nyid du bsgrubs nas skabs gzhan du de gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:240a-23: phyi'i rdo rje phreng ba'i nang du lhung na tshogs chen pos so //
T02TD1499E:240a-24: de nas me tog de slar gzung nas phreng ba la bcings te /
T02TD1499E:240a-25: phreng ba de pra ti gri han stvam ai mam sa tva ma h'a ba la /
T02TD1499E:240a-26: zhes 'don zhing slob ma'i mgo bor bcing bar bya zhes pa ni phreng ba'i dang gi cho ga'o //
T02TD1499E:240a-27: de'i rjes la slob ma'i snying gar zla ba la bdag po dang dpral bar ram dang mig gnyis la 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i aom gnyis bsgoms nas /
T02TD1499E:240a-28: rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyer kyi //
T02TD1499E:240a-29: mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad //
T02TD1499E:240a-30: mig ni thams cad 'byed mdzad do //
T02TD1499E:240a-31: rdo rje mig ni bla na med //
T02TD1499E:240a-32: aom dzny'a na tsa kashu h'um a'a: sv'a h'a /
T02TD1499E:240a-33: zhes 'don zhing mig ras bsal bar bya'o //
T02TD1499E:240a-34: de nas kye ltos shig ces brjod nas lha rnams kyi mtshan brjod pa sngon du 'gro ba'i 'khor lo'i bdag po nas brtsams te byang gi sgo skyong ba'am ji ltar yod pa gnong mdzes kyi bar du bstan nas /
T02TD1499E:240a-35: dad pa'i shugs kyis myur du ni //
T02TD1499E:240b-1: khyod ni sangs rgyas rigs su skyes //
T02TD1499E:240b-2: sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD1499E:240b-3: phun tshogs dngos grub thams cad ni //
T02TD1499E:240b-5: rdo rje padma mchog g-yo ba'o //
T02TD1499E:240b-6: sngags rnams ma lus sgrub par gyis //
T02TD1499E:240b-7: zhes brjod nas des kyang rdo rje dkyil 'khor chen por bdag zhugs so //
T02TD1499E:240b-8: rnal 'byor dkyil 'khor chen po bdag la bstan //
T02TD1499E:240b-9: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bdag gis mthong //
T02TD1499E:240b-10: zhes 'don du bcug nas dam tshig 'don du gzhug go //
T02TD1499E:240b-11: ho ho ho zhes bya ba ni slob ma la dkyil 'khor bstan zhing der gzhug pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1499E:240b-12: de nas chu'i dbang bskur ba'i don du bla ma la ji ltar 'byor pa'i yon phul nas pus mos la bcug te thal mo sbyar bas //
T02TD1499E:240b-13: byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas //
T02TD1499E:240b-14: ji ltar che ba'i byin ltar //
T02TD1499E:240b-15: bdag kyang bskyab pa'i don gyi phyir //
T02TD1499E:240b-16: nam mkha'i rdo rje ded bdag stsol //
T02TD1499E:240b-17: zhes brjod cing gsol ba gdab bo //
T02TD1499E:240b-18: de nas bla mas rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi ngos su ji ltar khrus kyi chu de la mi reg par shar phyogs kyi 'jug pa'i sgo la phyogs par shar phyogs su sna tshogs padma zhes bya ba la sogs par shin stan la sogs par mandala gyi bar du bya zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa'i sku gzugs kyi don du sngar bstan pa la slob ma rdo rje 'chang gi gzugs su bsgoms nas dkyil 'khor la mngon par phyogs par sbyang bar bya ste sngon du brjod pa'i aom a'a biggham zhes bya ba la sogs pas rim par sbyang bar bya ste /
T02TD1499E:240b-19: de la aom a'a: bighnam ta kri ta h'um zhes yungs kar la lan bdun bsngags te /
T02TD1499E:240b-20: g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi khu tshur gyis bzung la g-yon skor g-yas skor du so sor aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badra ya badzra satva sya sarba p'a pam da ha sv'a h'a /
T02TD1499E:240b-21: zhes brjod cing bya bas la yungs kar rnams mer blugs so //
T02TD1499E:240b-22: de bzhin du lan gsum du'o //
T02TD1499E:240b-23: de bzhin du g-yon skor dang g-yas skor du chu khyor ba gsum gyis lan gsum du bya'o //
T02TD1499E:240b-24: de nas me la dor la de bzhin du kham phor dkar po g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi phyag gis bzung nas g-yon skor gyis bya bas nas g-yon phyogs su gzhag go //
T02TD1499E:241a-0: g-yas skor gyis bya bas nas g-yas pa'i @241a * //
T02TD1499E:241a-2: de bzhin du lan gsum du'o //
T02TD1499E:241a-3: de bzhin du yang d'ur ba'i myu gu ba'i lci pa la glan pa rnams kyis so //
T02TD1499E:241a-4: de bzhin zan gyi chang bu rnams kyis so //
T02TD1499E:241a-5: de bzhin du ras kyis kyang byab po //
T02TD1499E:241a-6: de nas lag pa bkrus nas lag po slob ma la reg par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:241a-7: snying gar dris byug pa dang /
T02TD1499E:241a-8: me tog phreng ba mgo la gdags pa dang /
T02TD1499E:241a-9: mdun du mchod yon byin la mar mes bskor zhing 'khyil pa'am h'um gi yi ge lan bdun bzlas la mar dang bcas pa'i spos dkar gyis bdug par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bya ba pa'i rim pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1499E:241a-10: de'i rjes su bdud rtsi 'khyil pas bsngags pa'i d'ur ba'i chun pos zangs snod na gnas pa'i bdud rtsi lnga dang ba'i rnam lnga dag la aom h'um tr'am hr'i:kham kha /
T02TD1499E:241a-11: zhes brjod pas bskul la yang chu gtsang mas bkru zhing /
T02TD1499E:241a-12: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni //
T02TD1499E:241a-13: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
T02TD1499E:241a-14: de bzhin gshegs kun sku khrus gsol //
T02TD1499E:241a-15: de bzhin bdag gis khrus bgyi'o //
T02TD1499E:241a-16: de nas snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang rig pa'i lha mo rnams spyan drangs la mchod de slob ma dbang bskur ba'i don du /
T02TD1499E:241a-17: rdo rje can gyis sangs rgyas la //
T02TD1499E:241a-18: 'gro ba bskyab pa'i ched du dbang //
T02TD1499E:241a-19: yon tan 'byung gnas ji ltar stsal //
T02TD1499E:241a-20: de ltar 'di la stsal du gsol //
T02TD1499E:241a-21: zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pas gsol ba btab nas de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams shes rab dang snyoms par zhugs pa'i 'dod chags tshan pos zhu bar gyur nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgo nas nang du zhugs nas rdo rje'i lam nas byung ste lha mo'i padma nas zhugs te skad cig gis stong pa nyid kyi rjes la h'um dang rdo rje las skyes pa'i mi bskyod pa'i gzugs shes rab dang bcas pa'i ye shes sems dpa' dad dbyer med pa la dbang bskur nas slar phyag dang zhal la sogs pa'i sku padma nas byung ste /
T02TD1499E:241a-22: nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i spyan ma la sogs pa'i rig pa'i rig ma dang bcas pas gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang /
T02TD1499E:241b-0: gur gum la sogs pa'i char rnams dang lag pa'i yal ga dang bcas pa'i kha rgyan can du mang dkar po byang chub kyi sems kyi @241b bdud rtsis gang ba rnams kyis slob ma de dbang bskur ba'i tshe gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis /
T02TD1499E:241b-1: bkra shis gang zhig sems can kun gyi snying la gnas //
T02TD1499E:241b-2: thams cad bdag nyid rigs kun bdag po ye shes mchog / sems can ma lus skyed byed bde ba chen po yin //
T02TD1499E:241b-3: bkra shis des ni dbang bskur mchog de khyod la shog / phun sum tshogs pa mnga' bdag gser gyi ri bo 'dra //
T02TD1499E:241b-4: 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po dri ma gsum spangs pa //
T02TD1499E:241b-5: sangs rgyas padma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba'i spyan ras rgyas //
T02TD1499E:241b-6: bkra shis des ni khyod la deng 'dir zhi byed shog / de yi nye bar bstan ba'i mchog rab mi g-yo ba //
T02TD1499E:241b-7: 'jig rten gsum na grags shing lha dang mis mchod pa //
T02TD1499E:241b-8: chos kyi mchog rab skye dgu rnams la zhi byed pa //
T02TD1499E:241b-9: bkra shis des ni khyod la de ring zhi byed shog / dge 'dun dam pa chos ldan thos pa'i bkra shis phyug / lha dang mi dang lha mi yin gyi phyag gi gnas //
T02TD1499E:241b-10: tshogs kyi mchog rab ngo tsha shes dang dpal gyi gzhi //
T02TD1499E:241b-11: bkra shis des ni khyed la de ring zhi byed shog / ces pa'i bkra shis gyi glu rnams kyis nye bar sbyin zhing rang nyid kyis kyang de rnams blangs la rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'i bum pa rnams nas chu nyung zad bcus te padma'i snod du blugs pa'am yang na rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i chu aom ma h'a su kham badzra satva aa bhi she ka na stvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi sarba ta th'a ga ta aa dhi pa ti tve na dri dho me bha ba zhes brjod nas sam /
T02TD1499E:241b-12: bsdus pa la dga' na ma brjod par yang lag pa g-yas kyi rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lo mas so //
T02TD1499E:241b-13: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi'i bum pa rnams kyis so //
T02TD1499E:241b-14: de nas ji ltar rigs pa'i dkyil 'khor pa'i bum pa rnams so //
T02TD1499E:241b-15: med na ni rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i chu mi bskyod pa'i bdag nyid can byang chub kyi sems kyi bdud rtsi'i ngo bo rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lo ma'i rtse mos 'gying bag dang bcas pa'i chu gtor zhing /
T02TD1499E:241b-16: rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur bas //
T02TD1499E:241b-17: khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa //
T02TD1499E:241b-18: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi //
T02TD1499E:241b-19: gnas las byung ba sbyin par bya //
T02TD1499E:241b-20: ao badzrod ka aa bhi shinytsa h'um su ra ta stvam aa ham zhes brjod cing lan gsum du dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD1499E:242a-1: po dang snyoms par zhugs par bsam par bya'o zhes pa ni chu'i dbang gi cho ga'o //
T02TD1499E:242a-3: byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la //
T02TD1499E:242a-4: ji ltar che ba'i che byin ltar //
T02TD1499E:242a-5: bdag kyang bskyab pa'i don gyi phyir //
T02TD1499E:242a-6: nam mkha' rdo rje ded bdag stsol //
T02TD1499E:242a-7: zhes bla ma la gsol ba btab par gyur pas slob ma de aam dang rin po che las byung ba'i rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gzugs can ye shes sems dpa' dang gcig tu gyur pa las nam mkhar gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang lha mo rnams kyis bum pas dbang skur bar byed cing gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pas bkra shis kyi glu sgrogs par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:242a-8: rdo rje dang bdag po dang ming gi dbang lha rnams la yang de ltar ro //
T02TD1499E:242a-9: de nas gser la sogs pa las byas pa'i dbu rgyan rin chen 'byung ldan du bskyed cing de'i rang bzhin ye shes sems dpa'i ngo bo slob ma rigs kyi bdag po'i dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa ldar byin gyis brlabs pa'i dbu rgyan de'i mgo bo'i dbus dang dpral ba dang logs gnyis dang mgo bo'i rgyab rnams su rim pa bzhin aom dharma dh'a tv'i shva ri aa bhi shinytsa bhr'um /
T02TD1499E:242a-10: aom satva badzri aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02TD1499E:242a-11: aom ratna badzri aa bhi shinytsa hr'i:/
T02TD1499E:242a-12: aom karma badzri aa bhi shinytsi kham /
T02TD1499E:242a-13: zhes bya ba'i sngags lngas bzhag nas mgo bo la bskon zhing /
T02TD1499E:242a-14: rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba //
T02TD1499E:242a-15: khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa //
T02TD1499E:242a-16: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi //
T02TD1499E:242a-17: gnas las byung ba sbyin par bya //
T02TD1499E:242a-19: aom a'a:badzra mu ku ta aa bhi shinytsa h'um su rata stvam aa ham brjod nas /
T02TD1499E:242a-20: aom badzva tu shya ho zhes brjod pas dgyes par bya'o zhes pa ni dbu rgyan gyi dbang ngo //
T02TD1499E:242a-21: de nas aom h'um h'um hr'i: aa:/
T02TD1499E:242a-22: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis dpral bar dar dpyangs bcing par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:242a-24: byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la //
T02TD1499E:242a-25: ji ltar che ba'i che byin ltar //
T02TD1499E:242a-26: bdag kyang bskyab pa'i don gyi phyir //
T02TD1499E:242a-27: nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol ;
T02TD1499E:242a-28: / zhes gsol ba btab par gyur pa'i slob ma hr'i:dang padma yongs su gyur pa'i snang ba mtha' yas kyi gzugs can ye shes sems dpa' dang dbyer med pa rdo rje yang snang ba mtha' yas kyi bdag nyid du bsams nas /
T02TD1499E:242a-29: rdo rje chen po dbang bskur ba //
T02TD1499E:242b-0: khams gsum kun gyis phyag @242b byas pa //
T02TD1499E:242b-1: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi //
T02TD1499E:242b-2: gnas las byung pa sbyin par bya //
T02TD1499E:242b-4: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i dbang //
T02TD1499E:242b-5: de ring khyod la bskur bar bya //
T02TD1499E:242b-6: sangs rgyas kun gyi rab bsgrubs phyir //
T02TD1499E:242b-7: rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis zung //
T02TD1499E:242b-8: zhes brjod cing slob ma'i snying ga dang mgul ba dang mgo bo rnams su rdo rje reg nas lag pha g-yas su sbyin par bya'o zhes pa ni rdo rje'i dbang ngo //
T02TD1499E:242b-9: de nas byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la //
T02TD1499E:242b-10: ji ltar che ba'i che sbyin ltar //
T02TD1499E:242b-11: bdag kyang bskyab pa'i don gyi phyir //
T02TD1499E:242b-12: nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol //
T02TD1499E:242b-13: zhes gsol ba btab par gyur pa'i slob ma de kham dang ral gri las skyes pa'i don yod grub pa'i gzugs can ye shes sems dpa' dang dbyer med par bskyed la dril bu yang don yod grub pa yongs su gyur par bsams nas de'i lag pa g-yon du byin te lag pa rdo rje dril bu dang ldan pas phyag rgyal 'khyud pa'i tshul byed du bcug ste /
T02TD1499E:242b-14: rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba //
T02TD1499E:242b-15: khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa //
T02TD1499E:242b-16: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi //
T02TD1499E:242b-17: gnas las byung ba sbyin par bya //
T02TD1499E:242b-19: aom badzra aadhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi tishtha badzra sa ma ya stvam zhes aom badzra ghande aa aa /
T02TD1499E:242b-20: bcom ldan bdag gis gzung lags kyis //
T02TD1499E:242b-21: bdag la nye bar gyur par mdzod //
T02TD1499E:242b-22: ces 'don du gzhug par bya'o zhes pa ni bdag po'i dbang ngo //
T02TD1499E:242b-23: ming gzhan dril bu'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1499E:242b-25: byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la //
T02TD1499E:242b-26: ji ltar che ba'i che byin ltar //
T02TD1499E:242b-27: bdag kyang bskyab pa'i don gyi phyir //
T02TD1499E:242b-28: nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol //
T02TD1499E:242b-29: zhes gsol ba btab pa'i slob ma de aom dang 'khor lo las skyes pa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs can ye shes sems dpa' dang ro gcig par bsgoms nas spyi bor rdo rje dang dril bu bzung zhing /
T02TD1499E:242b-30: rdo rje chen por dbang bskur zhing //
T02TD1499E:242b-31: khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa //
T02TD1499E:242b-32: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi //
T02TD1499E:242b-33: gnas las byung ba sbyin par bya //
T02TD1499E:242b-34: zhes brjod nas aom rdo rje sems dpa' khyod rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD1499E:242b-35: zhe sdang rdo rje khyod ces bya ba'am /
T02TD1499E:242b-36: gti mug rdo rje khyod ces bya ba'am /
T02TD1499E:243a-0: de la sogs pa me tog lhung @243a * //
T02TD1499E:243a-1: ba'i rjes su 'brangs te rang gi rigs kyi ming rnam par snang mdzad kyi bdag nyid kyis dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD1499E:243a-2: de la rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan rnams ni mchog gi dang po'o //
T02TD1499E:243a-11: ye shes dang lhan cig skyes pa dang /
T02TD1499E:243a-13: re re zhing rdo rje'i sgrar sbyar bar bya ste de bzhin gshegs pa drug gi ming rnams kho na'o //
T02TD1499E:243a-14: mi bskyod pa'i mtshan rnams ni bzhad pa dang /
T02TD1499E:243a-26: rnam par snang mdzad kyi ni rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD1499E:243a-35: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ni rin po che dang /
T02TD1499E:243a-43: snang ba mtha' yas kyi ni 'dod chags dang /
T02TD1499E:243a-49: rab tu dga' ba'i myu gu dang /
T02TD1499E:243a-59: pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD1499E:243a-63: phrag dog rdo rje rnams so //
T02TD1499E:243a-64: rdo rje sems dpa'i btsun mo rnams ni rdo rje shugs can ma dang /
T02TD1499E:243a-65: rdo rje rol pa mo dang /
T02TD1499E:243a-69: rdo rje ba dan ma dang /
T02TD1499E:243a-70: rdo rje phreng ba ma dang /
T02TD1499E:243a-72: mi bskyod pa'i ni rdo rje bdag me dam dang /
T02TD1499E:243a-74: rdo rje phreng ba ma dang /
T02TD1499E:243a-76: rdo rje m'a ma k'i dang /
T02TD1499E:243a-77: rdo rje zhe sdang ma dang /
T02TD1499E:243a-79: rnam par snang mdzad kyi ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang /
T02TD1499E:243a-83: rdo rje gti mug ma dang /
T02TD1499E:243b-1: / rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ni rdo rje do shal ma dang /
T02TD1499E:243b-4: rdo rje phreng ba ma dang /
T02TD1499E:243b-5: rdo rje nam mkha' ma dang /
T02TD1499E:243b-6: rdo rje nam mkha' dga' ma'o //
T02TD1499E:243b-7: snang ba mtha' yas kyi ni rdo rje chags ma dang /
T02TD1499E:243b-16: don yod grub pa'i ni rdo rje snyems ma dang /
T02TD1499E:243b-20: rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma dang /
T02TD1499E:243b-21: dam tshig rdo rje ma dang /
T02TD1499E:243b-23: ming gi dbang gi cho ga'o //
T02TD1499E:243b-24: de nas slob ma des yon phul la thal mo sbyar la /
T02TD1499E:243b-25: bdag ni khyod kyi bka' drin las //
T02TD1499E:243b-26: gang gis rang bzhin don nus pa'i //
T02TD1499E:243b-27: rdo rje slob dpon gyi ni dbang //
T02TD1499E:243b-28: thugs rje'i gter kye bdag la stsol //
T02TD1499E:243b-29: zhes brjod pas bla ma la gsol ba btab la h'um dang rdo rje las skyes pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs su bsams nas rdo rje h'um las skyes par bsgoms nas /
T02TD1499E:243b-30: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02TD1499E:243b-31: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02TD1499E:243b-32: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02TD1499E:243b-33: rdo rje snyems bdag bdag po'i bdag / bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o zhes brjod cing de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje 'dzin du gzhug / de nas dril bu aa las skyes par bsgoms nas /
T02TD1499E:243b-34: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1499E:243b-35: dril bu dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad //
T02TD1499E:243b-36: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung //
