T02TD1499E:243b-37: byang chub mchog tu rgyal bas bzhed //
T02TD1499E:243b-38: ces brjod cing de kho na nyid kyis dril bu 'dzin du gzhug go //
T02TD1499E:243b-41: srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag / ngo bo nyid kyi srid bral ba //
T02TD1499E:243b-42: rang bzhin dag mchog sems dpa' yis //
T02TD1499E:243b-43: dam tshig srid par byed par 'gyur //
T02TD1499E:243b-44: zhes brjod cing dkrol bar bya'o //
T02TD1499E:243b-46: yid kyis lus ni bsten byas la //
T02TD1499E:243b-47: phyag rgya'i dam tshig yin par 'dod //
T02TD1499E:243b-48: gang gis lus kun sten byed pa //
T02TD1499E:243b-49: de ni phyag rgyar rab tu grags //
T02TD1499E:243b-50: ye shes phyag rgyar byin brlabs nas //
T02TD1499E:243b-51: 'dod pa thams cad longs spyod pas //
T02TD1499E:243b-52: dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par gyis //
T02TD1499E:244a-1: par byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i sku ye shes kyi phyag rgya kha sbyor gyi rim pas byin gyis rlob du bcug nas 'khyud pa'i tshul du byed du bcug la slob ma skad cig gis stong pa nyid du byas la h'um dang rdo rje las skyes pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs can ye shes sems dpa' dang ro gcig tu gyur par bsgoms pa'i mgor rdo rje dang dril bu bzung la aom ma h'a su kham badzra satva aa bhi she ka stvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi /
T02TD1499E:244a-2: sarba ta th'a ga ta aa dhi tishtha na dri dho me bha wa zhes lan gsum du'o //
T02TD1499E:244a-3: phyag rgya'i dam tshig gsum sbyin pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1499E:244a-4: de'i rjes la slob ma rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs su bsgoms te chu'i dbang la brjod pa'i snying ga'i sa bon la sogs pa nas /
T02TD1499E:244a-5: ji srid rdo rje rtse mor 'dzag pa yi //
T02TD1499E:244a-6: rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur //
T02TD1499E:244a-7: khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa //
T02TD1499E:244a-8: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi //
T02TD1499E:244a-9: gnas las byung ba sbyin par bya //
T02TD1499E:244a-10: aom a'a:sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka ta sa ma ya shri ye h'um sv'a h'a zhes 'don zhing dbang bskur ro //
T02TD1499E:244a-11: de nas mi bskyod pa cod pan du bsams nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang lha mo gzhan rnams de nyid du ye shes sems dpa'i ro bor bcug nas /
T02TD1499E:244a-12: aom su pra tishtha badzra sv'a h'a /
T02TD1499E:244a-13: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD1499E:244a-14: de la me tog la sogs pa dbul lo //
T02TD1499E:244a-16: mi ldog 'khor lo'i dbang bskur ba //
T02TD1499E:244a-17: mgon bo yis ni bdag la gsung //
T02TD1499E:244a-18: 'khor lo lha yi de nyid dang //
T02TD1499E:244a-19: slob dpon gyi ni las rnams dang //
T02TD1499E:244a-20: sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig dang //
T02TD1499E:244a-21: sdom pa gsang ba dam pa dag / rtag tu slob dpon bdag la gsung /
T02TD1499E:244a-22: sems can kun gyi don bgyid phyir //
T02TD1499E:244a-23: zhes khyad par gyi gsol ba btab la /
T02TD1499E:244a-24: de nas mdor bsdus nas gzhal yas khang 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid rnam par dag pa dang /
T02TD1499E:244a-25: mdor na phung po lnga rnams ni //
T02TD1499E:244a-26: sangs rgyas lngar ni rab tu grags //
T02TD1499E:244a-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pa lha rnams kyi de kho na nyid rnam par dag pa dang /
T02TD1499E:244a-28: don dam par dkyil 'khor la sogs pa rim pa gnyis ka la rang bzhin med pa'i bdag nyid can nyid rnam par dag pa dang /
T02TD1499E:244b-0: dkyil 'khor 'dri ba la sogs pa rdo rje slob dpon gyi las @244b 'khor dang bcas pa brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:244b-1: de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid la sogs pa'i ye shes dang 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i ngo bo dam tshig dang /
T02TD1499E:244b-2: bya ba dang mi bya ba'i bdag nyid can gyi sngom pa dang /
T02TD1499E:244b-3: de bzhin du bsgrub par bya ba la skal ba dang ldan pa nyid du brjod do //
T02TD1499E:244b-4: phyir mi ldog pa'i ming gzhan slob dpon gyi dbang gi cho ga'o //
T02TD1499E:244b-5: de nas bdag nyid kyis snying po la sogs pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad dam lan gsum du bzlas la /
T02TD1499E:244b-6: bcom ldan bdag gis stsal lags kyis //
T02TD1499E:244b-7: bdag la nye bar mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1499E:244b-8: zhes brjod cing slob ma la sbyin no //
T02TD1499E:244b-10: bcom ldan bdag gis bzung lags kyis //
T02TD1499E:244b-11: bdag la nye bar mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1499E:244b-12: zhes bya ba 'dis bzung nas lan gsum du bzlas par bya'o zhes pa ni /
T02TD1499E:244b-14: de nas gser ram dngul gyi snod du bzhag pa'i mar ram sbrang rtsi mig sman dang gser las byas pa'i thung mas slob ma'i mig la yi ge ram bsgoms la /
T02TD1499E:244b-15: aom badzra tra ni tra aa ba ha ra ba ta lam hr'i:zhes 'don zhing bskul nas /
T02TD1499E:244b-16: ji ltar mig sman rgyal po yis //
T02TD1499E:244b-17: 'jig rten rab rib bsal ba bzhin //
T02TD1499E:244b-18: bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i //
T02TD1499E:244b-19: ling tog rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal //
T02TD1499E:244b-20: zhes brjod do zhes pa ni mig sman gyi cho ga'o //
T02TD1499E:244b-21: de nas me long blangs nas aa yig bsngags nas slob mas blta zhing /
T02TD1499E:244b-22: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02TD1499E:244b-23: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
T02TD1499E:244b-24: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02TD1499E:244b-25: rgyu dang las las yang dag byung //
T02TD1499E:244b-26: rdo rje sems dpa' me long ltar//
T02TD1499E:244b-27: dag cing gsal la dri ma med //
T02TD1499E:244b-28: sangs rgyas kun bdag bu khyod kyi //
T02TD1499E:244b-29: rang nyid kyi ni snying la gnas //
T02TD1499E:244b-30: ngo bo nyid mad gnas med pa //
T02TD1499E:244b-31: de ltar chos rnams shes gyis la //
T02TD1499E:244b-32: sems can don ni mnyam med gyis //
T02TD1499E:244b-33: skyob pa rnams kyi sras su skye //
T02TD1499E:244b-35: me long gi dbang gi cho ga'o//
T02TD1499E:244b-36: de nas yi ge ho:las byung ba'i mda' gzhu ho:zhes brjod nas sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1499E:244b-37: zhes brjod pa ni mda' 'phen pa'i tshe yang ngo //
T02TD1499E:245a-0: slob mas sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga ya mi zhes brjod cing bgegs la 'bigs pa'i bsam pas phyogs bzhir mda' bzhi @245a * //
T02TD1499E:245a-3: de nas yol ba la sogs pas dben par byas la slob mas gsang dbang gi don du bla ma la gzhon nu ma lang tshol sogs pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab ma dam tshig dang ldan pa'am /
T02TD1499E:245a-4: de med na gzhan yang rung ste bla ma la phul nas bla ma rdo rje sems dpar mos la thal mo sbyar nas /
T02TD1499E:245a-5: khyod kyi zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis //
T02TD1499E:245a-6: bdag gis bla med bya ba thob //
T02TD1499E:245a-7: de phyir gsang pa'i dbang dag gis //
T02TD1499E:245a-8: mgon pos rjes su gzung bar mdzod //
T02TD1499E:245a-9: ces bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pas gsol ba gdab po //
T02TD1499E:245a-10: de nas bla mas 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi nga rgyal dang ldan pas tha mal pa'i bud med kyi gzugs de stong pa nyid kyi rjes la lha mo'i gzugs su bskyed pa dang rdo rje dang padma 'du byas pa sngon du 'gro ba'i snyoms 'jug byed cing /
T02TD1499E:245a-11: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1499E:245a-12: zhes 'don zhing snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan ma la sogs pa dang snyoms par zhugs pas bkug la bdag nyid kyis rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgo nas bcug la 'dod chags chen pos zhu bar gyur te aa wa rh'u t'i nas 'gro bar bsams nas rdo rje nor bur lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba brtan par byas te /
T02TD1499E:245a-13: mthe bong dang ming med kyi rdo rje nor bu btsir nas padma las byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa zhu ba'i khu bde rang gi byang chub kyi sems dang dbyer med par mos nas /
T02TD1499E:245a-14: gsung rdo rje'i gzugs can gyi slob mas mthong nas ma dad kyis dogs pa med pa'i khar ram /
T02TD1499E:245a-15: ji srid du gdong g-yogs bcings pa nyid kyis de mthong ba'i spyod yul ma yin par ro //
T02TD1499E:245a-17: ji ltar sangs rgyas sras dbang bskur //
T02TD1499E:245a-18: de ltar byang chub sems bzang pos //
T02TD1499E:245a-19: bu khyod dbang ni bskur bar bgyi //
T02TD1499E:245a-22: aom badzra dhri ka h'um zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyud ji lta ba bzhin du gdon zhing dbab par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:245a-23: des kyang rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshags pa kun 'dus pa'i blos aa ho ma h'a su kha zhes brjod cing btung bar bya'o //
T02TD1499E:245b-0: @245b shes rab mas kyang langs nas gos med pa nyid du rang gi chu skyes na gnas pa'i de lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems thig le'i rnam pa de ltar de'i khar dbab par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:245b-1: des kyang de ltar btung ngo //
T02TD1499E:245b-2: shes rab dang thabs dag gis kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems gsang ba'i dbang gis dbang bskur ba ni gsang ba'i dbang gi cho ga'o //
T02TD1499E:245b-3: de'i rjes la de'am gzhan yang rung ste /
T02TD1499E:245b-4: shes rab ma dam tshig dang sngom pa la gnas pa gzugs dang lang tsho dang ldan pa /
T02TD1499E:245b-5: byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la //
T02TD1499E:245b-6: ji ltar che ba'i che byin ltar //
T02TD1499E:245b-7: bdag kyang bskyab pa'i don gyi phyir //
T02TD1499E:245b-8: nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol//
T02TD1499E:245b-10: gsol ba btab pa'i slob ma la //
T02TD1499E:245b-11: gzugs ma shin tu nyams dga' 'di //
T02TD1499E:245b-12: bsten bya sangs rgyas rnams kyis brtags //
T02TD1499E:245b-13: 'khor lo rim pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1499E:245b-14: bde ba dam pa myong bar gyis //
T02TD1499E:245b-15: rdo rje skyil krung la sems ni //
T02TD1499E:245b-16: nor bur chud pa brtags pa yin //
T02TD1499E:245b-17: zhes bsgrub par byas nas gtang par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:245b-18: des kyang gur kum la sogs pa dri zhim pos byas pa gos gsar pa chu skyes slob ma la ston cing /
T02TD1499E:245b-20: bde ba thams cad yang dag ldan //
T02TD1499E:245b-21: gang zhig cho ga bzhin bsten pa //
T02TD1499E:245b-22: de yi mdun na bdag gnas so //
T02TD1499E:245b-23: sangs rgyas bsten pa la sogs pa //
T02TD1499E:245b-24: padmar bya ba ji bzhin gyis //
T02TD1499E:245b-25: bde chen rgyal po rang nyid ni //
T02TD1499E:245b-26: 'di dag tu ni rtag tu bzhugs //
T02TD1499E:245b-28: des kyang rang nyid lha'i gzugs kyis shes rab ma lha mo'i gzugs su bskyed nas aa dang h'um las skyes pa'i padma dang rdo rje dag gi ze'u 'bru dang nor bu aa dang aom las skyes pa dang rdo rje'i nor bu'i bu gar phat ser po bsgoms nas lus kyi g-yon gyi char song ba'i rtsa'i rtse mor hr'i:dmar po las byung ba gnas pa mdzum mo dang lces srid sngon du 'gro ba can gyis yang dag par bskul nas /
T02TD1499E:245b-29: aom si si si ha ha ha sv'a h'a /
T02TD1499E:245b-31: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga na badzra ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1499E:245b-32: zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod cing bla ma'i man ngag las dga' ba'i dbye ba sngon du byas nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis spyan drangs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pas lus byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD1499E:246a-0: bla mas kyang rnam par snang mdzad dang @246a * //
T02TD1499E:246a-1: spyan ma la sogs pa dpag tu med pa bcug pa dang /
T02TD1499E:246a-2: ro gcig tu gyur pas dga' ba brtsam par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:246a-3: shes rab sbyor bas dpal dang ldan //
T02TD1499E:246a-4: de nyid yang dag mtshon par bya //
T02TD1499E:246a-5: rdo rje skyil krung la sems ni //
T02TD1499E:246a-6: nor bu'i nang du chud par brtag / ces rtogs par byas nas nus pa ji lta bar bzung ste dal bus bton nas chu skyes las lce nyid kyis blangs te /
T02TD1499E:246a-7: de kho na nyid kyi lta bas dam tshig gi do bo byang chub kyi sems btung bar bya'o zhes pa ni shes rab ye shes dbang gi cho ga'o //
T02TD1499E:246a-8: de'i rjes la tshig kho nas dbang bzhi ba sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:246a-9: shes rab ye shes las byung ba'i myu gu lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems de bsgoms pas rab tu 'phel bar byas nas sgrib pa med par gyur nas de kho na nyid chos thams cad bsam du med pa'i rang bzhin yan lag bdun dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang gi rang bzhin dbang bzhi pa'i ngo bo brjod par bya'o zhes dbang bzhi pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1499E:246a-10: de'i rjes la de'i lag pa slob ma'i lag par bzhag nas de nyid rang gi lag pa g-yon par bzung ste rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag pa g-yas pa slob ma'i mgo bo la bzhag nas /
T02TD1499E:246a-11: 'dir ni khyed rnams dbang po yin //
T02TD1499E:246a-13: / zhes de bzhin gshegs pa la dpang btsugs te /
T02TD1499E:246a-14: thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs mi rgya //
T02TD1499E:246a-16: de phyir 'di dang bral bar ni //
T02TD1499E:246a-17: nam du yang ni ma byed cig /'di dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1499E:246a-18: rig pa brtul zhugs bla na med //
T02TD1499E:246a-19: rmongs pa gang zhig 'di spong ba //
T02TD1499E:246a-20: de la mchog gi dngos grub med //
T02TD1499E:246a-21: ces brjod pas rig pa'i brtul zhugs thams cad sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rig pa'i brtul zhugs sbyin pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1499E:246a-22: de'i rjes la slob ma rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs su bsgoms nas /
T02TD1499E:246a-23: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid //
T02TD1499E:246a-24: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas //
T02TD1499E:246a-25: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung //
T02TD1499E:246a-26: rdo rje sems dpa'i brtul zhugs brtan //
T02TD1499E:246a-27: zhes brjod cing rdo rje 'dzin du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:246a-28: des kyang aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra sa ma ya tishtha stvam dha ra y'a mi badzra sa tva hi hi hi hi h'i h'um: zhes brjod cing gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD1499E:246b-0: @246b rdo rje'i brtul zhugs kyi cho ga'o //
T02TD1499E:246b-1: de nas spyod pa'i brtul zhugs 'dod pa la gsungs pa ni gang yang bud med dam skyes pa spyod pa'i brtul zhugs slong pa de la rdo rje phag mo'i gzugs sam /
T02TD1499E:246b-2: bdag med ma'i gzugs sam me tog lhung ba dang bsnyun pa'i rig pa'i lha mo'i gzugs skyes pa ni bde mchog dang /
T02TD1499E:246b-3: dgyes ba rdo rje la sogs pa'i gang yang rung ba'i gzugs su bsams nas /
T02TD1499E:246b-4: de'am de la snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i ye shes kyi lha bcug nas gtso bo'i sngags lan gsum brjod nas /
T02TD1499E:246b-5: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya 'di //
T02TD1499E:246b-6: phyi dang nang du yang dag gnas //
T02TD1499E:246b-7: kha tv'am ga dang cang te'u snod //
T02TD1499E:246b-8: sbyin gyi dpa' bos gzung bar gyis //
T02TD1499E:246b-9: zhes brjod de kha tv'am ga dang cang te'u dang thod pa sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:246b-10: de nas 'khor lo mi bskyod pa'i skur cig car bskyed de //
T02TD1499E:246b-11: ye shes bcug nas mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin yin zhes mos nas aom dha ra bha ra /
T02TD1499E:246b-12: dha r'a ya dha r'a ya /
T02TD1499E:246b-14: badzra dhri ka phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1499E:246b-15: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis lan gsum du bsngags pa'i 'khor lo de tshig 'dis sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:246b-16: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya 'di //
T02TD1499E:246b-17: phyi dang nang du yang dag gnas //
T02TD1499E:246b-18: 'khor lo mi bskyod pa yi gzugs //
T02TD1499E:246b-19: sbyin gyis dpa' bos gzung bar gyis //
T02TD1499E:246b-21: / de nas rna rgyan 'od dpag med kyi skur cig car bskyed de ye shes bcu gnas 'od dpag med pa'i rang bzhin yin zhes mos nas aom badzra dharm'a: sa ma ya stvam h'um hu lu hu lu a'a ro li ka phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1499E:246b-22: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis lan gsum du bsngags pa'i rna rgyan de tshig 'dis sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:246b-23: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya 'di //
T02TD1499E:246b-24: phyi dang nang du yang dag gnas //
T02TD1499E:246b-25: rna rgyan 'od dpag med kyi bdag / sbyin gyis dpa' bos gzung bar gyis //
T02TD1499E:246b-26: zhes pas rna ba gnyis la'o //
T02TD1499E:246b-27: de nas mgul rgyan rin 'byung gi rang bzhin yin zhes mos nas aom badzra s'urya ta mo bhi dha ma nas ma ya stvam aa ham ratna dhri ka phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1499E:246b-28: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis lan gsum du bsngags pa'i mgul rgyan de tshig 'dis sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:246b-29: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya 'di //
T02TD1499E:246b-30: phyi dang nang du yang dag gnas //
T02TD1499E:246b-31: mgul gyi phreng ba rin chen che //
T02TD1499E:246b-32: sbyin gyis dpa' bos gzung bar gyis //
T02TD1499E:247a-0: @247a * // de nas gdu bu rnam snang gi skur cig car bskyed de ye shes bcug nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi ye shes yin zhes mos na aom sh'a shva ta par ma sh'a shva ta aa hye hi dzi na dzhi ka sv'a h'a /
T02TD1499E:247a-1: zhes pa'i sngags kyis lan gsum du bsngags pa'i lag tu de tshig 'dis sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:247a-2: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya 'di //
T02TD1499E:247a-3: phyi dang nang du yang dag gnas //
T02TD1499E:247a-4: lag gdub rnam snang nyid du bshad //
T02TD1499E:247a-5: sbyin gyis dpa' bos gzung bar gyis //
T02TD1499E:247a-6: zhes pas lag pa gnyis la'o //
T02TD1499E:247a-7: de nas skar rags don grub kyi skur cig car gyis bskyed de ye shes bcug nas don yod grub pa'i rang bzhin yin zhes mos nas aom phu: phu: hi hi hi pradzny'a dhri ka ces bya ba'i sngags kyis lan gsum du bsngags pa'i ska rags de tshig 'dis sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:247a-8: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya 'di //
T02TD1499E:247a-9: phyi dang nang du yang dag gnas //
T02TD1499E:247a-10: ska rags la ni grub pa zhugs //
T02TD1499E:247a-11: sbyin gyis dpa' bos gzung bar gyis //
T02TD1499E:247a-13: bud med kyi phyogs la ni tshogs su bcad pa la dpa' bo zhes bya ba phyung nas lha mo zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:247a-14: spyod pa'i brtul zhugs sbyin pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1499E:247a-15: de'i rjes la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam gyi tshul du byas nas chos gos kyi grva bzung ba'i khu tshur g-yon pa snying gar bzung zhing /
T02TD1499E:247a-16: g-yas pa mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgyas 'di ltar lung bstan pa'o //
T02TD1499E:247a-17: khyod ni nga yis lung bstan te //
T02TD1499E:247a-18: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1499E:247a-19: srid la mchog zhi rab bsgrub phyir //
T02TD1499E:247a-20: srid pa'i ngan 'gro nyid las bton //
T02TD1499E:247a-21: kye de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa siddhi sa ma ya stvam bhur bhu ba sva:/
T02TD1499E:247a-22: zhes pa'i sngags kyis me tog lhung ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bos slob ma la lung bstan par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:247a-23: gang 'di ltar lung ston par byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bya'o zhes dang bar bya'o zhes pa ni lung bstan pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1499E:247a-24: rig pa dang rdo rje spyod pa'i brtul zhugs dang lung bstan pa 'di rnams rgyud kha cig tu dbang bskur ba nyid du tha snyad byas so //
T02TD1499E:247b-0: de'i rjes la slob ma'i stan gyi mdun du'am kha cig tu ni gdan kha yang @247b aom badzra he tu mam zhes brjod cing bhr'um las skyes pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dang /
T02TD1499E:247b-1: lag pa g-yas su aom badzra bha sha ram zhes brjod cing aa las skyes pa'i dung dang /
T02TD1499E:247b-2: g-yon du dbyangs dang po las skyes pa'i po ti dbyangs dang aa brjod pa dang /
T02TD1499E:247b-3: dbyangs aa brjod cing byin nas dril bu dkrol du gzhug cing /
T02TD1499E:247b-4: thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02TD1499E:247b-5: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med //
T02TD1499E:247b-6: nam mkha' dang ni mnyam sbyor ba'i //
T02TD1499E:247b-7: kun spyod nam mkha'i ngang du gsal //
T02TD1499E:247b-8: deng nas brtsams te 'jig rten na //
T02TD1499E:247b-9: sems bskyed dang bcas kun gyis ni //
T02TD1499E:247b-10: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD1499E:247b-11: chos kyi dung ni bla na med ;
T02TD1499E:247b-14: de yis so sor mos ba las //
T02TD1499E:247b-15: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyis //
T02TD1499E:247b-16: zhes dril bu gtad de gsil bar byed do //
T02TD1499E:247b-17: de ltar rjes su gnang ba byin nas rjes su gnang ba lhag par gnang ba sbyin par 'dod pas rim pa bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gzugs su bsgoms ba'i slob ma la /
T02TD1499E:247b-18: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD1499E:247b-19: 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du //
T02TD1499E:247b-20: ji ltar gdul bya sna tshogs la //
T02TD1499E:247b-21: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyis //
T02TD1499E:247b-22: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD1499E:247b-23: 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du //
T02TD1499E:247b-24: ji ltar gdul bya sna tshogs la //
T02TD1499E:247b-25: rdo rje'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD1499E:247b-26: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD1499E:247b-27: 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du //
T02TD1499E:247b-28: ji ltar gdul bya sna tshogs la //
T02TD1499E:247b-29: rin chen 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD1499E:247b-30: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD1499E:247b-31: 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du //
T02TD1499E:247b-32: ji ltar gdul bya sna tshogs la //
T02TD1499E:247b-34: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD1499E:247b-35: 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du //
T02TD1499E:247b-36: ji ltar gdul bya sna tshogs la //
T02TD1499E:247b-37: las kyi 'khor lo rab tu bsgor //
T02TD1499E:247b-38: shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin dag /
T02TD1499E:247b-39: yid bzhin nor bu chen po ltar //
T02TD1499E:247b-40: bud med chags dang bral ba yis //
T02TD1499E:247b-41: sems can don ni bla med kyis //
T02TD1499E:247b-42: des kyang 'di la phyag byas nas //
T02TD1499E:247b-44: gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal ba //
T02TD1499E:247b-45: de ltar bdag gis bya ba bgyi //
T02TD1499E:248a-3: spyi bor gdugs ni bzung byas nas //
T02TD1499E:248a-4: skor ba byed du bcug nas ni //
T02TD1499E:248a-5: dkyil 'khor sgor ni thal sbyar la //
T02TD1499E:248a-6: gdugs bcas dab ba cing 'di skad brjod //
T02TD1499E:248a-7: slob ma 'di ni phul byas kyi //
T02TD1499E:248a-8: gsang sngags rgyud rnams 'dzin par shog ; ces bya bas 'khor lo'i dbang phyug la gsol pa btab nas gdugs gzhan du bzhag nas slob ma yid du 'ong ba la 'di skad brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:248a-11: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02TD1499E:248a-12: lha rnams kun gyis dgongs par 'gyur //
T02TD1499E:248a-13: sems can kun la brtse ba'i phyir /
T02TD1499E:248a-14: khyed kyis dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin //
T02TD1499E:248a-15: nan tan bskyed de bri bar bya //
T02TD1499E:248a-16: sgrub pa po rnams rgyud la sbyor /
T02TD1499E:248a-18: mthong ba dang ni zhugs 'gyur bas //
T02TD1499E:248a-19: sdig pa kun las nges par grol ;
T02TD1499E:248a-20: / khyed rnams de nyid legs par gnas //
T02TD1499E:248a-21: bde chen theg pa 'di la ni //
T02TD1499E:248a-22: phyi nas 'chi ba yod min no //
T02TD1499E:248a-23: mi tshugs ba dang mi srid pas //
T02TD1499E:248a-24: cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis //
T02TD1499E:248a-25: srid pa kun du dag byas phyir //
T02TD1499E:248a-26: srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod 'das //
T02TD1499E:248a-27: sangs rgyas rdor 'jen bcas kun gyis //
T02TD1499E:248a-28: tshe ldan de ring dbang bskur bas //
T02TD1499E:248a-29: khams gsum kun gyi rgyal srid che //
T02TD1499E:248a-30: bdag po kun du khyod nyid 'gyur //
T02TD1499E:248a-31: 'dod chags bral ba lta bu'i sdig / khams gsum na ni gzhan med do //
T02TD1499E:248a-32: de phyir 'dod chags dang bral bar //
T02TD1499E:248a-33: khyod kyis nam yang mi bya'o //
T02TD1499E:248a-34: 'dong pa kun la nyer spyod pas //
T02TD1499E:248a-35: gang la 'jigs med spyad par gyis //
T02TD1499E:248a-36: sha lnga bdud rtsi bza' bar bya //
T02TD1499E:248a-37: 'di las gzhan yang dam tshig bsrung //
T02TD1499E:248a-38: srog chags gsad par mi bya zhing //
T02TD1499E:248a-39: bud med rin chen spang mi bya //
T02TD1499E:248a-40: slob dpon spang bar mi bya ste //
T02TD1499E:248a-41: dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' bas ;
T02TD1499E:248a-42: / shes rab thabs su sems dpa' yis //
T02TD1499E:248a-43: mi bya ba ni cung zad mad //
T02TD1499E:248a-44: de bzhin gshegs gsungs ji lta ba'i //
T02TD1499E:248a-45: sdig pa med pas 'jigs ma byed //
T02TD1499E:248a-46: de ltar yid ni rab tu rdo rje nyid du gyis //
T02TD1499E:248a-47: rang gi dam tshig mi bzad de bzhin las brgya bstan par gyis //
T02TD1499E:248b-0: @248b de ring tshegs chung bde bar 'gro ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' dang //
T02TD1499E:248b-1: rab tu mnyam zhing rtag pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur //
T02TD1499E:248b-2: gzhan yang chos de rnams la sa chos de ji bzhin par //
T02TD1499E:248b-3: dbang bskur ba las dge ba'i ched du bu gces pa yi ma bzhin du //
T02TD1499E:248b-4: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi thugs dang bas yang dag par dgongs par mdzad do zhes bya ba ni dbugs dbyung pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1499E:248b-5: de ltar dbang thob pa'i slob ma dbugs 'byin zhing dga' bas 'di ltar bgyi'o //
T02TD1499E:248b-6: deng bdag skye ba 'bras bur bcas //
T02TD1499E:248b-7: bdag gi gson pa'ang 'bras bur bcas ;
T02TD1499E:248b-8: / de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes //
T02TD1499E:248b-9: sangs rgyas sras su deng bdag gyur //
T02TD1499E:248b-11: de nas gleng po che dang /
T02TD1499E:248b-22: khol po la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1499E:248b-24: bu dang bu mo la sogs pa rnams sam ji ltar nus pas bla ma la bsnyen bskur gyi phyir dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1499E:248b-25: gtor ma dang sbyin sreg dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang dge 'dun la ston mo la sogs pa yang bya'o //
T02TD1499E:248b-26: de nas cho ga ji lta bar rgyas pa dang zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byas nas rang nyid kyis dkyil 'khor mchod pas mchod de //
T02TD1499E:248b-27: thams cad kyis ci nus pa ji lta ba de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams la mchod pa gyis shig ces pas slob ma la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byed du bcug nas zhugs ba rnams la yang bza' ba dang /
T02TD1499E:248b-30: chang la sogs pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i tshul rnams kyis tshim par bya ste /
T02TD1499E:248b-31: de dag dang lhan cig tu mi nyal bar dkar po la sogs pa dang byang chub kyi sems sgrub pas yang dag par mchod nas khyod rnams kyis 'jug pa 'di su la yang brjod par mi bya'o /
T02TD1499E:248b-32: zhes bka' bsgos nas slob dpon gyis yon blang bar bya'o //
T02TD1499E:248b-33: des kyang gus pas dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1499E:248b-34: rin chen yid 'ong chung ma dang //
T02TD1499E:248b-35: rang gi lus dang zhing dang ni //
T02TD1499E:248b-36: ji ltar bla ma mnyes 'gyur dbul //
T02TD1499E:248b-37: mdor bsdus nas ni 'di ltar bya //
T02TD1499E:248b-38: bla ma mnyes na dngos grub 'grub //
T02TD1499E:249a-1: du min zhes thub pas gsungs //
T02TD1499E:249a-2: slob dpon bla med byed pa po //
T02TD1499E:249a-3: rdo rje sems dpa' mchod pa'o //
T02TD1499E:249a-4: de yi bsod nams ma byas ci //
T02TD1499E:249a-5: dka' thub ma spyad par yang dag / ces gsungs pas so //
T02TD1499E:249a-6: der slob ma bkod nas phyi rol tu phyogs skyong gi gtor ma gtang //
T02TD1499E:249a-7: mchod pa la sogs pa byas nas dang du zhugs nas dkyil 'khor la phyag 'tshal te 'khor lo'i bdag por mchod yon la sogs pa phul nas dge ba yongs la bsngo ste dkyil 'khor la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas shar sgor 'dug ste /
T02TD1499E:249a-8: yi ge brgya pa lan gsum brjod do //
T02TD1499E:249a-9: gang yang bdag blo gti mug pas //
T02TD1499E:249a-10: legs spyad 'di la nyes gyur gang //
T02TD1499E:249a-11: gang phyir lus can skyabs gyur pa //
T02TD1499E:249a-12: de kun mgon khyod bzod par gsol //
T02TD1499E:249a-13: gtso bo nas pa ma mchis shing //
T02TD1499E:249a-14: ma rnyed pa dang ma tshang pa //
T02TD1499E:249a-15: 'dir ni bya ba gang bgyis pa //
T02TD1499E:249a-16: de kun mgon khyod bzod pa'i gsol //
T02TD1499E:249a-18: aom khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02TD1499E:249a-19: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
T02TD1499E:249a-20: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
T02TD1499E:249a-21: slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1499E:249a-23: zhes pas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol nas rang nyid kyis sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor rang nyid la bcug la aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'a dya nu tpanna tv'a ta aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a aom a'a: h'um mu:/
T02TD1499E:249a-24: zhes 'don cing chos thams cad skye ba med par mos nas dril bu dkrol zhing lag pa na gnas pa'i rdo rjes shar sgro nas brtsams te tshangs thig gi lam nas gtso bo'i gnas kyi bar du dbyi zhing //
T02TD1499E:249a-25: rang gi mgo la rdul tshon cung zad tsam blugs nas padma la sogs pa'i bar du byi bar bya'o //
T02TD1499E:249a-26: de nas sgo rnams la gnas pa dang zur ni lag pa na gnas pa'i rdo rje'i rtse mos gzhig par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:249a-27: aom badzra k'i l'a ya auta k'i l'a ya sarba k'i lam badzra dha r'a y'a dzny'a ba ya ti h'um h'um h'um h'um phat ho zhes bya ba'am /
T02TD1499E:249a-28: h'um gi sngags kyis phur ba rnams bton nas /
T02TD1499E:249a-29: aom ru ru spu ru dzva la tishtha siddha lo ca ni sarba aa tva s'a dha ne sv'a h'a /
T02TD1499E:249a-30: zhes bya ba'i chu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pas bkru'o //
T02TD1499E:249b-0: phur ba'i lha rnams @249b gshegs su gsol lo /
T02TD1499E:249b-2: nang zhi ba la sogs pa'i don du gnyer ba la rdul tshon cung zad byin nas rgyal ba'i bum pa'am /
T02TD1499E:249b-3: bum pa gcad ma gzhan ras kyis brgyan pa'i rnal 'byor mas bzung ste /
T02TD1499E:249b-4: khyogs la zhon pa'i slob dpon nam /
T02TD1499E:249b-5: slob mas dril bu'i sgra dang rol mo'i sgra dang gdugs dang /
T02TD1499E:249b-8: mchod pa rnams dang ldan pas 'bab chu chen po'am chu zab mor khyer nas 'gram du 'dug ste ba'i lci bas byugs la dri dkar pos byugs /
T02TD1499E:249b-9: dkyil 'khor byas nas padma'i lte ba la rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02TD1499E:249b-10: 'dab ma la klu rnams sngon bzhin du mchod do //
T02TD1499E:249b-11: klu gtor gyi sngags kyis 'o thug gi gtor ma byin nas mchod do //
T02TD1499E:249b-12: klu rnams la rdul tshon gtan nas chu la blugs par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:249b-13: klu rnams kyis kyang bkur sti chen pos sa 'og tu khyer bar bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:249b-14: yang rdul tshon khyer ba'i bum ba de chus bkang nas de kho na bzhin bzhag ste /
T02TD1499E:249b-15: de nas zhi ba'i don du dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i khang pa chag chag gdab bo //
T02TD1499E:249b-16: ba'i lci bas byugs pa'i dkyil 'khor par gzhon nu ma rnams la 'o thug gi ston mos tshim par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:249b-18: mkho ba'i yo byad rnams bsdus nas //
T02TD1499E:249b-19: rang nyid kyis ni spyad par bya //
T02TD1499E:249b-20: slob ma la sogs cung zad yin //
T02TD1499E:249b-21: khung bu 'geng dang rab gnas dang //
T02TD1499E:249b-22: sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor nor gang yin //
T02TD1499E:249b-23: de kun slob dpon nyid dbang zhes //
T02TD1499E:249b-24: rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog gis gsungs //
T02TD1499E:249b-25: yon bdag gis rab gnas byas pa'i sku gzugs la sogs pa bskyod par rung ba ni rol mo'i sgra la sogs pas mchod pas rang rang gi gnas su khyer nas mchod par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:249b-26: slob dpon dang sgo'i dpon rnams ngang las kyi rdo rje can dang rnal 'byor ma rnams dang bzo rnams ji ltar rigs par nos pa ji lta bar ras la sogs pa dang so rtsi la sogs pas tshim par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:249b-27: dge 'dun la ston mo dang rnal 'byor ba la tshogs kyi 'khor lo yang bya'o //
T02TD1499E:249b-28: dman pa dang mgon med pa rnams la'ang tshim par bya'o zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor nye bar bsdu pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1499E:250a-1: 'dir ni dkyil 'khor bri ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1499E:250a-2: bri ba'i cho ga 'di yid kyis bsgrubs pa'i cho ga nyid kyis kyang 'bras bu dang ldan no zhes bya bas yid kyi cho ga kho na mchog yin no //
T02TD1499E:250a-3: de'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i gzugs kyis sa gzung ba la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1499E:250a-4: sku gzugs la sogs pa'i rab gnas dang /
T02TD1499E:250a-5: slob ma la dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD1499E:250a-7: zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi mthar thug pa thams cad yid kyis bya'o //
T02TD1499E:250a-8: de nyid kyi tshe gang gis kha cig tu sbrel ba dang 'di dag thams cad byar mi nus pa'am mi rnyed pa de'i tshe bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1499E:250a-9: de'i tshe dngos po yod pa la yang bsam gtan kho na gtso bo yin no //
T02TD1499E:250a-10: 'on kyang 'jig rten pa lta ba dang sbyin pa la mngon par dag pa la sogs pas bsod nams spel ba 'ga' zhig gi che du phyi mchod kyi cho ga 'dod do //
T02TD1499E:250a-11: rgyu med cing tshogs pa dang bral bas ni bsgom pa kho nas cho ga thams cad bsgrub par bya'o zhes sngon gyi slob dpon rnams kyis gsungs so //
T02TD1499E:250a-12: de'i phyir las dang po pas kyang sems brtan pas yid kyis sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor du sngon gyi rab gnas dang /
T02TD1499E:250a-13: skal ba la bstan pa dang dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD1499E:250a-14: de ltar yang sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud las /
T02TD1499E:250a-15: shes rab padma'i nang dbus su //
T02TD1499E:250a-16: dpag tshad byi ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD1499E:250a-17: dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni //
T02TD1499E:250a-18: mkhas pas slob ma dbang bskur bya //
T02TD1499E:250a-19: zhes pa dang gzhan du yang gsungs pa ste /
T02TD1499E:250a-20: yid kyis 'ga' zhig nyid du ni //
T02TD1499E:250a-21: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bya bar bzhed //
T02TD1499E:250a-22: ces gsungs so zhes pa ni yid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o //
T02TD1499E:250a-23: slob dpon chen po aa bha y'a ka ra guptas mdzad pa'i dbang bskur gyi rab tu byed pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1499E:250a-25: // / pandi ta de nyid dang mkhas pa bande shes rab dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o//
